We believe in an inclusive culture where everyone feels like they belong. We support each other, win together, celebrate success together, and overcome challenges together.  

  

Today, we are close to 100 dedicated experts with a positive and solution-oriented mindset. Most importantly, we take care of each other, and we never forget to have fun.

title: Infrastructure and Platform Manager
description:
Flightradar24 is one of the most successful growth-stage tech companies in Stockholm. Each month more than 50 million aviation enthusiasts visit Flightradar24 (app/website) and our Commercial services team has many of the biggest names in aviation on its customer list.


We are looking for an Infrastructure and Platform Manager to lead and evolve our AWS based infrastructure platform and internal IT landscape.

**Note that this position requires that you are able to work in Stockholm, Sweden. Relocation is not offered for this role.**

**What you’ll do**
------------------

**Your responsibilities include**

* End-to-end responsibility for AWS-based infrastructure, shared platforms
* Accountable for availability, performance, security and cost
* Hands-on in critical infrastructure and platform components
* Lead and grow a multidisciplinary infrastructure organization, DevOps enablement, Application Management and Internal IT.
* Enable development teams through reliable DevOps tooling for secure, scalable and efficient delivery.
* Collaborate closely with engineering, product, and security stakeholders to align technology with business goals.
* Responsibility for CI/CD platforms, Infrastructure as Code, monitoring, and incident management.
* Be part of the Tech Management team and contribute to our Tech Strategy
* Report to the CTO

**Required technical competence**

* Deep hands-on experience operating production infrastructure on AWS.
* Strong experience with Terraform and container platforms (Docker, Kubernetes/EKS).
* Comfortable contributing code in infrastructure and automation workflows.
* Knowledge of security best practices and cost optimization in AWS.
* You enjoy collaboration, take ownership of your work, and thrive in a fast-paced environment.

**Who you are**
---------------

* 5+ years leading Infrastructure team operating AWS platform at scale
* Senior leader who combines technical depth with people leadership
* Is self-driven and comfortable making technical decisions independently
* Can quickly understand and work within an existing Infrastructure platform and architecture
* Values clean code, testing, automation, and pragmatic engineering practices
* Communicates clearly and professionally in English

### **About Flightradar24**


Flightradar24 is the leading flight tracking and aviation data provider, leveraging the world’s largest ADS-B network. Our B2C platform serves millions, while our B2B solutions empower airlines, airports, and aviation stakeholders with essential operational insights.


All this is made possible thanks to our globally distributed network of 55,000+ radio receivers that feed real-time aircraft data into the Flightradar24 platform. Over a billion database entries are added each month and we are processing several years of historical data totalling many terabytes. Our proprietary flight tracking data is industry leading and even investigative government agencies from around the world rely on it for aviation accident investigations.


Benefits of working at Flightradar24 include:

* Opportunity to impact a service with millions of end users from all around the world
* Contribute to the value which Flightradar24 creates both for B2C and B2B but also for humanity.
* Modern office in the heart of beautiful downtown Stockholm, Sweden
* Being part of a diverse team
* Flexible and social work environment with free beverages, fruit, and snacks

title: Senior .NET Tech Lead / Plattform
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 7 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling i C#/.NET (Core/6+)
* Erfarenhet av att bygga nya webbaserade lösningar med mikrotjänstarkitektur
* Praktisk erfarenhet av Azure, särskilt eventdrivna lösningar och Azure Service Bus
* Erfarenhet av Azure Functions, App Service, Key Vault, Storage och Event Grid
* Erfarenhet av både SQL- och NoSQL-databaser (t.ex. Azure SQL, Cosmos DB)
* Gedigen erfarenhet av REST-API-design och integrationsmönster
* Erfarenhet av DevOps/CI/CD och testautomation
* Stark samarbetsförmåga i tvärfunktionella team
* Svenska eller engelska i professionell nivå

  

**Meriterande**  

* Tech lead / arkitekt i uppstart av ny plattform eller produkt
* DDD, Clean Architecture eller modulära arkitekturmönster
* Azure API Management, OpenAPI och kontraktstester
* Observability (t.ex. OpenTelemetry) och SRE-arbetssätt
* Infrastruktur som kod (Bicep/Terraform)
* Molnsäkerhet, identitet och åtkomststyrning
* Eventdriven arkitektur och avancerade integrationsmönster
* Erfarenhet av B2B-portaler eller partnerintegrationer
* Samarbete med frontendteam (t.ex. React)

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 17-02-2026 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Tester
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

 **Job Description**  

* Executing hands‑on testing across functional tests, integration tests, regression, and end‑to‑end flows for consumer loan products.
* Testing the full consumer loan lifecycle, including onboarding, scoring/decisioning, loan creation, repayment schedules, refinancing, customer communications, and fees/interest configurations.
* Preparing test cases, test scenarios and test data required to validate product behaviour across multiple systems and integrations.
* Executing country‑specific test cases, including regulatory requirements and payment flows where relevant.
* Validating product parameters and business rules established by the Offering Product Manager.
* Ensuring test alignment with to‑be processes, SOPs and operational behaviour defined by the Business Team Lead.
* Logging defects, supporting root‑cause analysis, following up on fixes and coordinating cross‑team dependencies.
* Supporting User Acceptance Testing (UAT) by preparing cases, guiding business testers, and validating results.
* Providing clear status reporting on progress, defects, risks and test evidence to the market’s Project Manager and program Test Lead.

 **Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* Hands‑on experience testing consumer loan products or similar banking products.
* Strong understanding of consumer lending flows: application, scoring, loan creation, repayment logic, customer communication, and regulatory checkpoints.
* Strong testing skills in functional, integration, and end‑to‑end scenarios across multi‑system landscapes.

  

**Application deadline:** 16-02-2026 **About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: OpenWRT Specialist / Embedded Linux Engineer
description:
**About** **Munters**


Munters is a global leader in energy-efficient solutions for industrial environments. With our innovative technologies, we create sustainable climate solutions that optimize performance, safety, and reliability in demanding industrial processes. Our products are used worldwide across a wide range of sectors, from manufacturing and data centers to agricultural applications. At Munters, we combine technical expertise with a strong focus on quality, innovation, and sustainability.

 **About** **the Role**


Are you ready to take on a key technical role in the development of advanced networking solutions for embedded systems? We are looking for an **OpenWRT Specialist / Embedded Linux Engineer** to join our team.


In this role, you will play a critical part in ensuring high-quality delivery from our development team in Sweden, with a strong focus on embedded Linux development. You will collaborate closely with colleagues, contribute to technical implementation, and support test automation. You will also be a strong advocate for quality and security throughout the development lifecycle, driving the implementation of OpenWrt and other embedded Linux systems.

 **Key****Responsibilities**

* Develop and maintain software components for OpenWrt-based systems
* Customize and extend OpenWrt packages to meet product requirements
* Implement and integrate MQTT and Modbus protocols for IoT and industrial connectivity
* Collaborate with hardware and firmware teams to ensure seamless integration
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to embedded Linux systems
 **Requirements**

* 7+ years of experience with OpenWrt and embedded Linux development
* 7+ years in C/C++ and scripting languages (e.g., Shell, Python)
* Good understanding of network protocols (TCP/IP, DHCP, VPN, VLAN)
* Hands-on experience with MQTT and Modbus communication protocols
* Familiarity with Linux kernel, device drivers, and cross-compilation
* Experience with Git and modern DevOps tools
* Ability to work with REST or GraphQL APIs for integration
* Familiarity with security hardening for embedded systems
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills in English
**Nice** **to** **Have**

* Experience with containerization (Docker) and CI/CD pipelines
* Knowledge of wireless technologies (Wi-Fi, LTE)
**Soft Skills**

* Strong team player with a collaborative mindset — you value alignment and shared ways of working
* Comfortable working in a dynamic environment where processes are evolving
* High level of initiative and strong problem-solving ability — able to take ownership and move tasks forward independently as well as in a team
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills — essential for working in a distributed global development environment
* Experience in an international company with a Western/European work culture, where transparency, proactivity, and personal responsibility are expected
* Proactive and solution-oriented, with a drive to improve and streamline development practices
* Enjoys sharing knowledge and working closely with colleagues to achieve common goals
 **What** **We Offer**

* A key role in a growing, strategically important team
* An international and innovative work environment
* Competitive salary and benefits package
* Opportunities for personal and professional development
* Company culture that values precision, ownership, and collaboration
 **Ready** **to****shape** **the** **future** **of** **embedded** **Linux** **solutions** **at Munters?**  

Don’t wait—submit your application today, and you might soon be joining our team!


Do you have any questions or would you like more information?  

Feel free to contact **Yannick Voet, Talent Acquisition Specialist**:


yannick.voet@munters.com  

+32 (4)86 93 89 11
company_description: Munters is a global leader in climate control solutions for mission-critical processes.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**ABOUT SINCH**

Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.  



Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.  



At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!  



**DESCRIPTION**

We are seeking a Data Platform Engineer to build, maintain, and support data infrastructure that powers our products worldwide. In this role, you will be a part of our Data Fabric team, responsible for overseeing our data infrastructure. Your blend of infrastructure expertise and data skills will ensure our operations run smoothly.  



This role is based in Stockholm, Sweden, and functions under a hybrid model, reporting to the Engineering Manager.  



**As our Data Platform Engineer, you will:**

As a member of our team, you will develop and maintain our data infrastructure and craft robust monitoring solutions to ensure healthy and stable production systems. You’ll also play a crucial role in continuously enhancing the platform with new capabilities to meet evolving business needs. Your expertise in developing powerful, scalable, and maintainable data infrastructure solutions will be essential to the success of our data operations at Sinch.  



* Lead technically and align with business counterparts.
* Support colleagues and foster a culture of collaboration.
* Define, plan, and implement solutions for arising needs.
* Collaborate with other parts across Sinch optimize and improve existing solutions.
* Support innovation with your expertise and proactive approach.

**REQUIREMENTS**

* A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.
* An experienced professional with 3-6 years of senior-level capacity in Data Engineer, Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), Platform Engineer, or Software Engineer.
* Software background is a plus.
* Knowledgeable in one of the three big cloud providers, preferably GCP.
* Proficient in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) e.g., Terraform, Ansible and DevOps procedures.
* Proficiency in SQL, preferably BigQuery.
* Good communication skills.

Our corporate language is English, please submit your application in **English.**

At Sinch, we value learning, embrace change, and offer opportunities for personal and professional growth. Unfortunately, we are not supporting relocation at this time.  



Applicants must:  



* Hold Swedish or EU/EEA citizenship.
* Have a valid Swedish work permit.

**OUR HIRING PROCESS**

We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.  



We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/ . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
company_description: We help companies to communicate with customers via messaging, voice and video using multiple channels. Simplifying life by bringing all people and businesses together using technology is our purpose.

title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
För kunds räkning söker en erfaren Business Analyst. Du kommer främst att arbeta inom projekt som rör dokument- och ärendehantering inom Region Skåne.
  
Du kommer att tillhöra enheten ”Strategi och Utveckling” inom området Information på Koncernkontoret. Du kommer att arbeta i ett team om cirka 10 personer som brinner för att göra dokument- och ärendehantering smartare och effektivare för alla inom Region Skåne. För närvarande är deras största fokus att införa en ny användarplattform som heter DokIT. Införandet utförs inom ramen för ett program som leds av en programchef. Det är inom programmet som ditt huvudsakliga arbete kommer att ske. De eftersträvar ett agilt arbetssätt, engagemang, öppenhet och användarfokus. De arbetar också nära sin IT-organisation och sina leverantörer.
  
Du förväntas vara självgående i ditt arbete. Därför är det viktigt att du har praktisk erfarenhet av att arbeta med behov och krav för koncerngemensamma verksamhetstjänster. Utöver arbete som normalt utförs av en Business Analyst ska du kunna leda verksamhetsprojekt. De arbetar med PPS-metodik för projektledning. Vidare förutsätts god förmåga att kommunicera i tal och skrift på svenska. Du ska kunna genomföra presentationer för lednings- och användargrupper som både är sakliga och inspirerande. Du är inte rädd för att hjälpa dina kollegor i deras arbete. Du är en teamspelare som både kan ta och ge konstruktiv feedback.
  
Då de är ett litet team behöver du vara flexibel och inte vara främmande för att också utföra arbete utanför rollen som Business Analyst.
  
De tillämpar vid behov arbetsprov innan en kandidat engageras i uppdraget.
  
  

**Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:**  

Arbetsuppgifter som normalt förekommer för en Business Analyst
  
Vara delaktig i arbetet med att ta ett användarbehov hela vägen till nyttorealisering
  
Medverka i och leda möten med verksamheter och användare av tjänsterna
  
Samla in, analysera och dokumentera behov
  
Göra ekonomiska bedömningar av projekt och behov
  
Utforma, modellera och dokumentera krav
  
Kommunicera verbalt och skriftligt med användare och intressenter
  
Genomföra utbildningar
  
Genomföra workshoppar
  
Leda projekt
  
  

**Obligatoriska kvalifikationer:**  

Relevant utbildning inom till exempel systemvetenskap, projektledning eller ekonomi
  
Minst fem års erfarenhet av arbete som Business Analyst eller annan motsvarande roll
  
Har arbetat med verksamhetsbehov och förändringsarbete
  
Erfarenhet av agila arbetsmetoder
  
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med externa leverantörer av IT-produkter och tjänster
  
Kommunikativ och kan framföra ett budskap på ett inspirerande och pedagogiskt sätt
  
Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift
  
Goda kunskaper i engelska i tal och skrift
  
  

**Meriterande kvalifikationer:**  

Erfarenhet av OpenText-produkter
  
Erfarenhet av arbete med dokument- och ärendehantering
  
Erfarenhet av ledarskap inom relevant område
  
Erfarenhet av Azure DevOps eller motsvarande verktyg som används i arbete med IT-projekt
  
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med externa IT-leverantörer
  
Arbetat i offentlig organisation
  
Medverkat i upphandling i offentlig verksamhet
  
Erfarenhet av SAFe-metodik
  
Erfarenhet av informationssäkerhet och dataskyddsförordningen
  
Relevant certifiering inom området
  
Kunskaper om ITIL

title: Senior Platform and Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Flightradar24 is one of the most successful growth-stage tech companies in Stockholm. Each month more than 50 million aviation enthusiasts visit Flightradar24 (app/website) and our Commercial services team has many of the biggest names in aviation on its customer list.
  
We are looking for a skilled Platform and Infrastructure Engineer to join our growing Infrastructure team and help us build, scale, and maintain our cloud infrastructure and services in AWS.
  
The position requires that you are able to work in Stockholm, Sweden. Relocation is not offered for this role.
  
What you’ll do
  
Your responsibilities include
  
Design, implement, and manage reliable infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code principles.
  
Work closely with developers to streamline CI/CD pipelines and improve deployment speed and stability.
  
Ensure high availability, security, and performance across our AWS services.
  
Monitor systems, troubleshoot incidents, and continuously improve observability and resilience.
  
Own database infrastructure, incl. provisioning , migrations, backups, replication, performance tuning.
  
Build and operate an internal developer platform that provides reproducible environments.
  
  

Required technical competence
  
Hands-on experience with AWS services such as EC2, EKS, RDS, S3, and IAM.
  
Experience with Terraform, Ansible, Docker and Kubernetes
  
**Cloud & Data Platform on AWS, Streaming & Messaging:** Kafka, RabbitMQ
  
**Databases & Storage:** SQL/NoSQL systems (e.g., MySQL/MariaDB/Postgres, Redis, DynamoDB, data lake/warehouse patterns)
  
**DevOps & Platform:** Docker, Kubernetes/EKS, Terraform
  
**Engineering practices:** Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD, linting, unit tests, integration tests
  
Be comfortable automating workflows using scripting languages such as Bash or Python.
  
Knowledge of security best practices and cost optimization in AWS
  
You enjoy collaboration, take ownership of your work, and thrive in an environment with clear vision, short feedback loops, and continuous improvement.
  
  

Who you are
  
Has 5+ years of hands-on experience building and operating production systems
  
Is self-driven and comfortable making technical decisions independently
  
Can quickly understand and work within an existing codebase and architecture
  
Values clean code, testing, automation, and pragmatic engineering practices
  
Communicates clearly and professionally in English
  
  

About Flightradar24
  
Flightradar24 is the leading flight tracking and aviation data provider, leveraging the world’s largest ADS-B network. Our B2C platform serves millions, while our B2B solutions empower airlines, airports, and aviation stakeholders with essential operational insights.
  
All this is made possible thanks to our globally distributed network of 50,000+ radio receivers that feed real-time aircraft data into the Flightradar24 platform. Over a billion database entries are added each month and we are processing several years of historical data totalling many terabytes. Our proprietary flight tracking data is industry leading and even investigative government agencies from around the world rely on it for aviation accident investigations.
  
  

**Benefits of working at Flightradar24 include:**  

Opportunity to impact a service with millions of end users from all around the world
  
Contribute to the value which Flightradar24 creates both for B2C and B2B but also for humanity.
  
Modern office in the heart of beautiful downtown Stockholm, Sweden
  
Being part of a diverse team
  
Flexible and social work environment with free beverages, fruit, and snacks

title: Infrastructure and Platform Manager
description:
Flightradar24 is one of the most successful growth-stage tech companies in Stockholm. Each month more than 50 million aviation enthusiasts visit Flightradar24 (app/website) and our Commercial services team has many of the biggest names in aviation on its customer list.
  
We are looking for an Infrastructure and Platform Manager to lead and evolve our AWS based infrastructure platform and internal IT landscape.
  
Note that this position requires that you are able to work in Stockholm, Sweden. Relocation is not offered for this role.
  
What you’ll do
  
Your responsibilities include
  
End-to-end responsibility for AWS-based infrastructure, shared platforms
  
Accountable for availability, performance, security and cost
  
Hands-on in critical infrastructure and platform components
  
Lead and grow a multidisciplinary infrastructure organization, DevOps enablement, Application Management and Internal IT.
  
Enable development teams through reliable DevOps tooling for secure, scalable and efficient delivery.
  
Collaborate closely with engineering, product, and security stakeholders to align technology with business goals.
  
Responsibility for CI/CD platforms, Infrastructure as Code, monitoring, and incident management.
  
Be part of the Tech Management team and contribute to our Tech Strategy
  
Report to the CTO
  
  

Required technical competence
  
Deep hands-on experience operating production infrastructure on AWS.
  
Strong experience with Terraform and container platforms (Docker, Kubernetes/EKS).
  
Comfortable contributing code in infrastructure and automation workflows.
  
Knowledge of security best practices and cost optimization in AWS.
  
You enjoy collaboration, take ownership of your work, and thrive in a fast-paced environment.
  
  

Who you are
  
5+ years leading Infrastructure team operating AWS platform at scale
  
Senior leader who combines technical depth with people leadership
  
Is self-driven and comfortable making technical decisions independently
  
Can quickly understand and work within an existing Infrastructure platform and architecture
  
Values clean code, testing, automation, and pragmatic engineering practices
  
Communicates clearly and professionally in English
  
  

About Flightradar24
  
Flightradar24 is the leading flight tracking and aviation data provider, leveraging the world’s largest ADS-B network. Our B2C platform serves millions, while our B2B solutions empower airlines, airports, and aviation stakeholders with essential operational insights.
  
All this is made possible thanks to our globally distributed network of 55,000+ radio receivers that feed real-time aircraft data into the Flightradar24 platform. Over a billion database entries are added each month and we are processing several years of historical data totalling many terabytes. Our proprietary flight tracking data is industry leading and even investigative government agencies from around the world rely on it for aviation accident investigations.
  
  

**Benefits of working at Flightradar24 include:**  

Opportunity to impact a service with millions of end users from all around the world
  
Contribute to the value which Flightradar24 creates both for B2C and B2B but also for humanity.
  
Modern office in the heart of beautiful downtown Stockholm, Sweden
  
Being part of a diverse team
  
Flexible and social work environment with free beverages, fruit, and snacks

title: ERP Application Specialist - Logistics & SCM
description:
Why Join Us?
We’re on a mission to empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. As the world-leader in assistive communication solutions, we empower our customers to express themselves, connect with the world, and live richer lives.  

At Tobii Dynavox, you can grow your career within a dynamic, global company that has a clear, impactful purpose - with the flexibility to also do what truly matters to you outside of work. What’s more, you’ll be part of a work culture where collaboration is the norm and individuality is welcomed.  

As a member of our team, you’ll have the power to grow ideas in an unconventional environment. At the same time, you’ll work in a culture of ongoing learning and development, allowing you to constantly expand your area of expertise.  

About the role:  

  

We’re growing our IT Product Management function and are looking for an ERP Application Specialist - Logistics & SCM to help strengthen our enterprise platforms. In this role, you’ll own our Logistics and Supply Chain Management capabilities in Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O and make sure our processes are efficient, compliant, and continuously improving. You’ll work closely with business teams while staying hands-on in the application to drive scalable, high-quality operations across regions.‑on in the application to drive scalable, high-quality operations across regions.  

Key Responsibilities:* End-to-End Process Ownership and Cross-functional Collaboration
* Application Support & Incident Management
* Configuration & Functional Ownership
* Continuous Improvement & Solution Design
* Release & Change Management
* Master Data Governance
* Training, Documentation & User Enablement

  

What We’re Looking For:
Technical & Functional Skills  

* Strong understanding of end-to-end supply chain processes and cross-functional flows.

  

* Solid experience in D365 F&O, especially: Procurement, Inventory, Warehouse Management, Sales & Order Management, and Logistics Execution.

  

* Familiarity with Azure DevOps, Data Management/DMF, Excel Add-ins, and ISVs (Lasernet, Avalara, EBizCharge, Medius, Axcite TMS).

  

* Basic understanding of integrations (AIS, OData).
  

Soft Skills  

* Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking.

  

* Excellent communication and ability to connect business and IT perspectives.

  

* Adaptable, detail-oriented, and collaborative.

  

* Ability to navigate stakeholder dynamics and support effective change management.

Apply today!
We believe in empowering individuals - including our own employees - to reach their full potential. So, if you want to change lives while growing your own career, we’d love to hear from you.
Where we stand:
We believe diversity not only enriches our workplace culture, but also gives us a strategic advantage. Working with people from a variety of backgrounds and perspectives helps us all become better communicators, better problem solvers, and better human beings. Our differences make us stronger.
Tobii Dynavox values equality of opportunity, human dignity, and racial/ethnic and cultural diversity. Tobii Dynavox does not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, disability, age, veteran status, ancestry, or national or ethnic origin.  

Equal Opportunity Employer/AA Women/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled

title: Automotive CI/CD and DevOps engineer to ALTEN Lund
description:
We at ALTEN Lund are looking for a CI/CD and DevOps engineer to join our automotive team. Are you ready for the next challenge in your career? Apply today!

**What we can offer you:**


Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN! We believe in growing together by offering opportunities, development and togetherness. ALTEN operates in several different industries, having a wide variety of assignments, coaching managers and training through ALTEN Academy, which means that it will always be possible to develop at ALTEN. Your wishes will guide your way forward.


As a consultant, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN. Through our different internal networks, such as Women@ALTEN and ALTEN Sports you will get the opportunity to drive topics and activities that are close to your heart. At ALTEN, we think it’s important to have a balance between work and spare time, which is why we offer three extra days off a year. We have a collective agreement and offer benefits like pension, insurances and wellness grants.



**The role:**


You will be developing and maintaining the infrastructure that enables continuous delivery of high-quality embedded systems. As a CI/CD Developer, you will work in an agile, cross-functional team where you are not just maintaining pipelines, but also building the foundation that allows our engineers to ship safer, better software, faster.

**Your profile:**

* B.Sc. or M.Sc. in computer science or other related field.
* Experience of software development and/or CI development.
* Strong **Python** development skills.
* Solid experience of working with **Jenkins** and **Docker**.
* Proficiency in Linux environments and agile methodologies such as Kanban and Scrum.
* Fluent in English (written and spoken).

**Meritorious qualifications:**

* Zuul and Bazel.
* Experience with Kubernetes.
* Experience of working in Azure environments.
* Background in test automation.
* Experience with monitoring and logging tools (ELK, Grafana).
* Experience with Ansible.
* Fluency in Swedish.

 **About ALTEN**


ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest technology and IT consulting companies with over 57,000 employees in nearly 30 countries. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the value chain of the most prestigious companies in all sectors, such as Automotive, Defense, Energy & Environment, Industry, Public services & Government and Life Sciences. In Sweden, we are about 1300 committed employees with 9 offices in 9 cities – from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north.


For the fifth year in a row, ALTEN has been named one of Sweden’s most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen, an award for employers that offer unique career and development opportunities.


Welcome to read more about us at alten.se


  
JOBB DETALJER


 11/02/2026


Lund
REKRYTERING KONTAKT


 ALTEN Sweden

title: Senior testledare – Stockholm heltid
description:
Modernera är ett modernt rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag. www.modernera.se
  
För en kunds räkning söker vi nu en senior testledare. Vår kund levererar lösningar som gör att deras kunder kan öka förändringstakt och kvalitet i sina digitala tjänster. Företagets kunder finns främst bland teleoperatörer, offentlig sektor, bank och försäkring i Sverige och Norge. Företaget har funnits sedan 1999 och består idag av ett 60-tal medarbetare.
  
Du kommer att jobba i trevliga lokaler i centrala Stockholm. Det finns möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån.
  
Du kommer att arbeta i varierande projekt och stå inför intressanta utmaningar för att effektivisera företagets kunders tekniska vardag.
  
Vår kund tror på en välplanerad kunskapsutveckling för att tillsammans kunna erbjuda det bästa inom testledning. Du kommer att erbjudas en gedigen utvecklingsresa oavsett erfarenhetsnivå och dina kunskaper kommer omvandlas till nytta som gör skillnad. Du är alltid uppbackad av erfarna kollegor samt den gemensamma kunskapen som utgör kärnan i företagets framgångar.
  
Du är rätt för rollen om du har utbildning på kandidatnivå och har över 3 års erfarenhet av:
  
Programmering (JavaScript, Java)
  
Enhetstestramverk (JUnit, Cucumber)
  
Teknisk testning
  
Testautomationsverktyg (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, Test Complete, UFT)
  
CI/CD-verktyg (Azure DevOps, Gitlab, Jenkins)
  
Agila arbetssätt
  
Versionshantering (Git)
  
  

**Meriterande är om du även har eller är van vid:**  

ISTQB-certifiering (om det saknas fixar vi det tillsammans)
  
Kunskap inom modern infrastruktur med containers/mikrotjänster (som Kubernetes plattformar)
  
Att ta fram teststrategier
  
Att coacha andra inom testautomation
  
Att sätta upp ramverk
  
Passar ovanstående in på dig och du vill vara en del av en stimulerande arbetsmiljö med högt i tak, få kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, arbeta i projekt med teknik i framkant då är det bara att ansöka nu!
  
Du kommer att bli anställd hos vår kund. Heltid. Provanställning som övergår i en tillsvidareanställning efter sex månader. Tillträde: omgående.
  
Ansök genom att skicka ditt CV och personligt brev till info@modernera.se. Skriv ”Senior testledare – Stockholm heltid” i ärenderaden.

title: Integrationsarkitekt - Nivå 4
description:
### **OM JOBBET**


Du som senior konsult kommer att hjälpa till i en pågående leverans mot en myndighet i Stockholm. Du blir anställd konsult hos oss på D-Source. Uppdraget är kortare och förväntas vara klart på ca 300 timmar.


### **ARBETSUPPGIFTER**

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**

* Du kommer att samordna och leda arbetet av en grupp inom domänen integration.
* Du stöttar arbetsgruppen med kompetens och vägledning inom området integration.
* Du delta och driver i aktiviteter kring förflyttningar mot målbild.
* Du vidare utvecklar nuvarande integrations målarkitektur, både kortsiktiga och långsiktiga inom API och integration

**Förväntade resultat**

* Utforma en API-strategi med en målbild som stödjer verksamhetens mål
* Ta fram styrande dokument för API-hantering
* Principer, riktlinjer och styrmodeller:
* Riktlinjer och standard för API Management-plattform
* Rutiner och säkerhetsprinciper (OAuth2, OpenID Connect, rate limiting)
* Riktlinjer för API-design (REST, GraphQL, event-driven)
* Dokumenterad arkitektur och säkerhets principer
* Standardiserade processbeskrivningar.
* Ge stöd till utvecklingsteam i implementering av API:er
* Definiera API-styrningen: (standarder, versionering, livscykelhantering)
* Handlingsplan med prioriterade aktiviteter och milstolpar.
* Publicerade vägledningar för utvecklingsteam.

### **ERFARENHETER OCH EGENSKAPER**

* Konsulten ska uppfylla krav för rollen enligt nivå 4.
* Ledning – Tar huvudansvar för ledning av större grupp
* Självständighet – Mycket stor
* Djup kunskap om API-design och integrationstekniker.
* Erfarenhet av API Management-verktyg (exempelvis WSO2, Azure API Management, Apigee, Kong, osv.)
* Förståelse för CI/CD, DevOps och automatisering
* Erfarenhet av datadelning och tillgängliggörande.
* Erfarenhet av framtagande av styrande dokument.
* Förståelse för verksamhetsprocesser och hur API:er stödjer dem.
* Förmåga att förklara tekniska koncept för icke-tekniska intressenter.
* Stark dokumentationsförmåga (strategidokument, riktlinjer).

### **TID FÖR ANSÖKAN**


Låter detta som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi intervjuar löpande!

### **OM D-SOURCE**

*Your source to IT*  

D-Source är ett modernt konsultbolag med bredden mellan helpdesk, infrastruktur och Tech. Vi har lång erfarenhet av att förstå kunders IT-behov! Tveka inte att höra av dig om du är intresserad av att ta reda på mer.


Vad kan vi göra för dig och vad kan vi göra tillsammans?

### **INGET JOBB FÖR DIG?**


Lugnt! Du kan alltid registrera dig förutsättningslöst på D-Source jobbsida genom att Connecta med oss. Då hamnar du i vår kandidatdatabas och får koll på våra kommande aktuella tjänster.

title: Onsite Tekniker – Göteborg
description:
Vill du arbeta nära användarna, göra verklig skillnad i vardagen och samtidigt vara en del av ett konsultnätverk där gemenskap, utveckling och långsiktighet står i fokus? CREW by Sigma söker nu en **Onsite Tekniker** till ett spännande uppdrag i Göteborg inom ett globalt, högteknologiskt industribolag.


Hos CREW blir du inte bara en konsult – du blir en del av ett sammanhang. Vi tror på nära dialog, tydliga uppdrag och att skapa förutsättningar för att du ska trivas, utvecklas och lyckas i ditt uppdrag.


I rollen blir du en nyckelspelare i det digitala teamet och fungerar som länken mellan användare och de digitala tjänster de använder dagligen. Du arbetar verksamhetsnära med stort fokus på service, kvalitet och stabil leverans, samtidigt som du bidrar till kontinuerliga förbättringar av användarupplevelsen.


Uppdraget är 100 % onsite i Göteborg, med flexibilitet mellan olika kontorslokaler.

##### **Om rollen**


Rollen är bred och varierad och kombinerar hands-on support med proaktivt förbättringsarbete. Du arbetar med dagligt Onsite-stöd för teknikrelaterade frågor och incidenter samt ger lokalt hårdvaru- och mjukvarustöd inom exempelvis Windows, macOS, iOS, Android och nätverkstjänster. I rollen ingår även ansvar för konferensrum och AV-utrustning, där du hanterar setup, felsökning och support, samt skrivarhantering och serverbaserade lösningar.


Du ansvarar för onboarding av nya medarbetare och samarbetar nära både interna team och externa leverantörer kring tekniska lösningar. Vidare arbetar du proaktivt med incidenthantering och digital utveckling samt bidrar till analys, dokumentation och kontinuerlig förbättring av kunskapsbaser.

##### **Kvalifikationer**

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av ServiceNow
* Erfarenhet av DevOps
* Erfarenhet av Office 365 och Azure
* Kunskap inom Intune och grundläggande IT-säkerhet
* Erfarenhet av användarnära IT-support (onsite och/eller lokal support)
* God kommunikativ förmåga i svenska och engelska

##### **Vem är du?**


Du är serviceinriktad, lösningsorienterad och trygg i mötet med användare. Du arbetar strukturerat, proaktivt och självgående, trivs med många kontaktytor och har ett intresse för både snabba supportärenden och långsiktiga förbättringar.

**Om CREW by Sigma**


CREW är ett konsultbolag som erbjuder kompetens inom områden som inköp, logistik, IT Support, försäljning, ekonomi och HR. Vi har lång erfarenhet av rekrytering och ett stort nätverk för att matcha engagerade medarbetare med roliga och utmanande uppdrag hos våra kunder.  

  

Vi är en del av Sigma Group, Sveriges största privatägda konsultgrupp med över 5000 anställda i 14 länder.

 **Ansökan**


Urval och intervjuer kommer att ske löpande. Tjänsten kan komma att bli tillsatt innan sista ansökningsdag, ansök därför så snart som möjligt.

title: Verksamhetstestare – Järnvägssystem MPK
description:
Vi söker flera verksamhetstestare för järnvägssystemet MPK med varierande erfarenhetsnivåer till Trafikverket.


Detta är ett konsultuppdrag. Stationeringsort är Stockholm.


Tjänsten är på 60-100%


Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget**


Trafikverket söker resurskonsulter – både erfarna och övriga – för verksamhetstest inom projektet MPK Vidareutveckling. Konsulterna ska delta i system- och regressionstest av MPK-lösningen för kapacitetsplanering på järnväg, validera ny funktionalitet, rapportera fel samt stödja analys och kunskapsöverföring till Trafikverkets anställda.

 **Arbetsuppgifter**


Systemtest: skriva testfall och genomföra test för att säkerställa att nya funktioner fungerar korrekt i hela MPK-lösningen.


Regressionstest: skriva testfall och genomföra test för att säkerställa att nya releaser inte inför fel i befintlig lösning.


Rapportera fel enligt etablerade rutiner.


Stödja felanalys tillsammans med andra delar av projektet.

**Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**

**Gemensamma krav (alla konsulter)**


Högskoleutbildning minst 180 hp inom relevant område. Trafikverket bedömer vad som anses vara relevant.


Minst tre (3) års (36 månader) arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete med planering av kapacitet inom järnväg (tåg eller banarbete). Trafikverket bedömer vad som anses vara relevant.


Minst 1200 timmars, de senaste 3 (tre) åren, arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha testat IT-system för kapacitetsplanering på järnväg. Med testverksamhet menas att analysera och utforma testfall med förutsättningar och förväntat resultat, genomföra test utifrån testfall i systemtest och regressionstest. Det innebär också att genomföra utforskande test och verifiera rättade avvikelser samt specificera behov av testdata.


Arbetslivserfarenhet och god kunskap av arbete med Team Foundation Server/Azure DevOps. Trafikverket bedömer vad som är god kunskap.


Minst ett (1) års arbetslivserfarenhet av att i testverksamhet, inom en större verksamhet som till exempel Trafikverket, tillämpat kapacitetsplaneringsprocesser för kapacitetsplanering på järnväg för tåg och banarbeten.


Arbetslivserfarenhet och god kunskap om hur järnvägsbranschen fungerar och hur tågplaneprocessen är uppbyggd, för att kunna testa ny och befintlig funktionalitet i nya releaser. Trafikverket bedömer vad som är god kunskap.


Konsulterna ska kunna kommunicera på god svenska i tal och skrift, och i förekommande fall även kunna kommunicera på engelska.


Konsulterna ska ha god planerings- och samarbetsförmåga, både gällande arbetet i den egna gruppen såväl som i andra delar av projektet.

**Erfarna konsulter (utöver gemensamma krav)**


Minst 2400 tim (motsvarar 2 år (24 månader) med 70% sysselsättningsgrad) erfarenhet av att ha testat komplexa IT-system för kapacitetsplanering på järnväg. Med testverksamhet menas att analysera och utforma testfall med förutsättningar och förväntat resultat, genomföra test utifrån testfall i systemtest och regressionstest. Det innebär också att genomföra utforskande test och verifiera rättade avvikelser samt specificera behov av testdata.


Minst 2400 timmars (motsvarar 2 år (24 månader) med 70% sysselsättningsgrad) erfarenhet av att i testverksamhet, inom en större verksamhet som till exempel Trafikverket, tillämpat kapacitetsplaneringsprocesser för kapacitetsplanering på järnväg för tåg och banarbeten.


God kunskap om järnvägsinfrastruktur och dess olika komponenter, förvärvad genom minst 2400 timmars (motsvarar 2 år (24 månader) med 70% sysselsättningsgrad) arbete med kapacitetsplanering på järnväg.

**Meriterande**


Du har erfarenhet av att i minst 1200 timmar, inom ramen för projekt MPK, analyserat, utvecklat och utrett krav inom TPS från HaCon.

**Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**


Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Senior Platform and Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Flightradar24 is one of the most successful growth-stage tech companies in Stockholm. Each month more than 50 million aviation enthusiasts visit Flightradar24 (app/website) and our Commercial services team has many of the biggest names in aviation on its customer list.


We are looking for a skilled Platform and Infrastructure Engineer to join our growing Infrastructure team and help us build, scale, and maintain our cloud infrastructure and services in AWS.**The position requires that you are able to work in Stockholm, Sweden.** **Relocation is not offered for this role.**

**What you’ll do**
------------------

**Your responsibilities include**

* Design, implement, and manage reliable infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code principles.
* Work closely with developers to streamline CI/CD pipelines and improve deployment speed and stability.
* Ensure high availability, security, and performance across our AWS services.
* Monitor systems, troubleshoot incidents, and continuously improve observability and resilience.
* Own database infrastructure, incl. provisioning , migrations, backups, replication, performance tuning.
* Build and operate an internal developer platform that provides reproducible environments.

 **Required technical competence**

* Hands-on experience with AWS services such as EC2, EKS, RDS, S3, and IAM.
* Experience with Terraform, Ansible, Docker and Kubernetes
* Cloud & Data Platform on AWS, Streaming & Messaging: Kafka, RabbitMQ
* Databases & Storage: SQL/NoSQL systems (e.g., MySQL/MariaDB/Postgres, Redis, DynamoDB, data lake/warehouse patterns)
* DevOps & Platform: Docker, Kubernetes/EKS, Terraform
* Engineering practices: Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD, linting, unit tests, integration tests
* Be comfortable automating workflows using scripting languages such as Bash or Python.
* Knowledge of security best practices and cost optimization in AWS
* You enjoy collaboration, take ownership of your work, and thrive in an environment with clear vision, short feedback loops, and continuous improvement.

**Who you are**
---------------

* Has 5+ years of hands-on experience building and operating production systems
* Is self-driven and comfortable making technical decisions independently
* Can quickly understand and work within an existing codebase and architecture
* Values clean code, testing, automation, and pragmatic engineering practices
* Communicates clearly and professionally in English

### **About Flightradar24**


Flightradar24 is the leading flight tracking and aviation data provider, leveraging the world’s largest ADS-B network. Our B2C platform serves millions, while our B2B solutions empower airlines, airports, and aviation stakeholders with essential operational insights.


All this is made possible thanks to our globally distributed network of 50,000+ radio receivers that feed real-time aircraft data into the Flightradar24 platform. Over a billion database entries are added each month and we are processing several years of historical data totalling many terabytes. Our proprietary flight tracking data is industry leading and even investigative government agencies from around the world rely on it for aviation accident investigations.


Benefits of working at Flightradar24 include:

* Opportunity to impact a service with millions of end users from all around the world
* Contribute to the value which Flightradar24 creates both for B2C and B2B but also for humanity.
* Modern office in the heart of beautiful downtown Stockholm, Sweden
* Being part of a diverse team
* Flexible and social work environment with free beverages, fruit, and snacks

title: Product Owner
description:

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* . To be successful in this role you will have proven experience in a previous Product Owner role and a minimum 5 years of experience leading agile teams in a best-practice App product development environment
* User obsessed, you are known for always being the user advocate and speaking to users almost as much as the customer support team
* Pragmatic, you understand in a large company there are things that are prioritized from other areas or stakeholders and can easily organize around that
* Getting things done is in your nature, when others are not sure where to start or who to involve, you see a clear path to organize the work and define next steps
* Bringing a team together, leveraging synergies and keeping the team strong and healthy are aspects of your day to day
* Looking for new rituals or methods to increase collaboration in complex environments is often marked as checked on your to do list
* Ambiguity is your friend, you feel comfortable around it
* Multitasking and prioritizing are fun for you
* Presenting and explaining the rationale behind decisions to partners, stakeholders and your team is always time well spent in your eyes
* International experience and exposure have been valuable parts of your journey

title: BizTalk DevOps Engineer - Stockholm
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

We are seeking an experienced BizTalk DevOps Engineer to support and enhance an enterprise integration platform. The role involves maintaining, monitoring, and optimizing BizTalk-based integration solutions in a production environment. You will collaborate with international teams to ensure stable, secure, and efficient integration services. Fluency in English (spoken and written) is required. Swedish language skills are considered a strong advantage.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

* Maintain and support integration solutions built on BizTalk Server
* Design, develop, and maintain build and release pipelines for BizTalk applications
* Monitor BizTalk environments to ensure high availability and performance
* Handle production incidents and conduct root cause analysis
* Perform platform upgrades, patches, and maintenance activities
* Ensure reliable operation of the integration platform in line with best practices

**Requirements:**

* Strong proficiency in BizTalk Server Administration
* Hands-on expertise with BT360
* Experience working with ITIL-based ticketing systems
* Solid experience with Azure DevOps pipelines, GIT, YAML, and PowerShell
* Strong knowledge of Windows Server and Microsoft SQL Server
* Familiarity with Azure Dashboards and Application Insights

**What We Offer:**

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Development Manager & Tech Lead
description:
*Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Vårt största fokus är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar att få leva din passion tillsammans med oss. Var du kommer ifrån är inte relevant - det är vart du är på väg som är intressant för oss. Precis som vi igår inte kunde drömma om det Fortnox som finns idag, så kan du vara med och forma vilka vi är imorgon.*

**Om tjänsten**  

Vi söker en Development Manager & Tech Lead till vår nya avdelning IT Enablement. Här får du en unik möjlighet att bygga upp en ny funktion från grunden, där du fokuserar på värdeskapande teknik såsom integrationer, identitetshantering (IAM) och AI-implementering för att underlätta för våra medarbetare.


Som ledare för IT Enablement ansvarar du för strategin kring intern identitetshantering och systemintegration. Din mission är att säkerställa att vi bygger interna lösningar som är skalbara, säkra och som "bara fungerar" för våra medarbetare.


Du kommer att leda ett växande team som i dagsläget består av en IT Developer, men som inom kort ska växa med ytterligare två utvecklare samt två Business Automation Engineers.

* Dina IT Developers bygger "motorvägarna" (backend/API) som får Fortnox interna system att prata med varandra
* Dina Business Automation Engineers fungerar som bryggan mot verksamheten; de kartlägger processer och implementerar AI-stöd och automationer för att hjälpa jurister, ekonomer och HR att jobba smartare

**Din roll**  

Din huvudsakliga uppgift är att säkerställa teamets välmående och deras förmåga att leverera resultat. Du ansvarar för att bygga en kultur av teknisk excellens och proaktivitet. Rollen är tudelad mellan strategiskt ledarskap och tekniskt ansvar:

* **Ledarskap & Coaching**: Du coachar, inspirerar och utvecklar individer och team. Du har personalansvar för både utvecklare och automation engineers.
* **Strategiskt ägande (IAM-integration)**: Du äger strategin för hur vi säkerställer att våra medarbetare har rätt behörigheter enligt vår masterdata i alla interna system och tjänster och säkerställer att access-flöden är säkra och effektiva. Du samarbetar tätt med Corporate IT Manager som äger den interna IT-infrastrukturen och IT-stöd.
* **Arkitektur & Kvalitet**: Du säkerställer att teamets lösningar (API:er, AI-agenter) följer företagets policies, riktlinjer och arkitekturella principer. Du kan bedöma kodkvalitet och tekniska vägval och coacha utvecklare till bra resultat.
* **Stakeholder Management**: Du agerar brygga mot Workplace & Services och definierar SLA:er och överlämningspunkter. Du för dialog med interna funktioner (HR, Legal, Finance) för att prioritera de projekt som ger störst effekt.

**Vi söker dig**  

För att lyckas i denna roll behöver du ha en fot i tekniken och en i ledarskapet.

* **Ledarskap**: Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda tekniska team, gärna med personalansvar. Du är kommunikativ och har förmågan att hålla ögonen på målen utan att tappa bort människan.
* **Teknisk bakgrund**: Du har en bakgrund som systemutvecklare (gärna inom backend), DevOps eller arkitekt.
* **IAM-kompetens**: God förståelse för ekosystemet kring identiteter (Active Directory, Entra ID, SCIM) är avgörande då ditt team ansvarar för access-flödena.
* **Fokus på effektiva verktyg**: Du har god förståelse för de verktyg som effektiviserar en medarbetares vardag.
* **Språk:** Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av SCIM samt arbete med DevOps och CI/CD.

**Vi erbjuder**  

En chans att vara en del av en ständig förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Du kommer att arbeta nära teamen och andra managers för att lära befintliga arbetssätt, samtidigt som du får stor möjlighet att påverka hur vi tillsammans ska arbeta framåt.


I denna roll rapporterar du till Head of Infrastructure. Placeringsort är Växjö eller Stockholm.

**Fortnox - mitt i företagslivet**  

Fortnox hjälper företag att starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska lösningar för företag och redovisningsbyråer, smidig finansiering och ett ekosystem av starka partnerskap är Fortnox ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vi drivs av visionen om ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag.


Fortnox grundades 2001 med huvudkontor i Växjö. Läs mer på**www.fortnoxgroup.com**.
Välkommen med din ansökan!

**Bra att veta**
----------------

**Arbetsort:** Växjö, Stockholm

**Kontaktperson:** Kristin Grön **kristin.gron@fortnox.se**

**Sista ansökningsdatum:** Urval och intervjuer sker löpande


**Arbetstid:** Heltid


**Tillträde:** Snarast eller enligt överenskommelse

title: Senior Innovation Engineer
description:
**Introduction to Eficode**  

We’re building the future of software development - driving innovation across Cloud, DevOps, Agile, Service Management, and AI-powered transformation. Our mission is to help organizations evolve into truly software-driven enterprises, enabling them to deliver faster, smarter, and more sustainably. We believe in changing the world by sharing our expertise and enabling teams to work better through modern technology and intelligent automation.


As an Atlassian Platinum Partner, we have been recognized multiple times as Atlassian Partner of the Year, most recently for 2024–25. We are also proud to be a two-time GitHub Partner of the Year in EMEA and an Azure Managed Service Provider. With over 600 experts across 10 countries, we bring together leading talent from the Nordics, continental Europe, the UK, and the Americas.

**Role purpose**


In this role, you’ll be the technical driver in our innovation “lab” environment. You’ll take early-stage inputs - anything from high-level product vision to rough experimental code - and turn them into functional, well-structured systems that help us validate direction quickly.


This is a highly hands-on role: you will spend the majority of your time building, iterating, and refining working software.  

  

Importantly, our prototypes are not meant to be disposable. Many of them mature into internal platforms, accelerators, or productized offerings - which means that some of them will require ongoing maintenance and improvements as they become used by others.

 **Role responsibilities**  

*Your main responsibilities as our Senior Innovation Engineer will include (but won’t be limited to):*

* Build V0/V1 prototypes for new R&D initiatives, from concept to working implementation.
* Turn ambiguous inputs (vision, sketches, experimental snippets) into a coherent architecture and codebase.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather context early, clarify constraints, and move forward without waiting for perfect specs.
* Maintain a strong engineering baseline in prototypes: clean structure, pragmatic testing, and documentation so work can be continued.
* Support prototypes as they mature: fix issues, refine performance and usability, and improve maintainability when a prototype starts getting real users.
* Review innovation prototypes across the organization, mentoring teams to ensure solutions are grounded in sound engineering and business value

 **Role Requirements:**  

*You will make a great match for this role if you have:*

* Have experience taking ideas from “early concept” to working prototypes/MVPs and iterating based on feedback.
* Are comfortable making architecture and engineering decisions: selecting stacks, defining boundaries/interfaces, and setting a maintainable foundation.
* Take ownership in ambiguous environments: you proactively align with stakeholders, ask the right questions, and drive work forward.
* Care about quality even in R&D contexts (pragmatic tests, clean code, CI/CD basics, and documentation).
* Are a team player: collaborative, supportive, and happy to share knowledge and help others succeed.
* Swedish language skills (at least basic) and fluency in English is needed.
* You musthave full working rights in Sweden.

 **Nice to have’s:**  

*It would be an added bonus if you have:*

* Experience in R&D / innovation labs, internal product incubation, or consultancy-style delivery with shifting requirements.
* Cloud experience (AWS/Azure/GCP), containers, and modern runtime patterns (Docker/Kubernetes/serverless).
* Experience applying AI/LLM-enabled development in a pragmatic way to accelerate prototyping.
* Mentoring/technical leadership experience in code reviews and raising engineering quality across teams
* A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field - or equivalent practical experience.

 **What’s in it for you?**

* Be part of a leading DevOps and Atlassian consulting company with over 600 experts across 10 countries
* Work with exciting customers across industries and tackle complex system implementation projects
* Grow your career in a learning driven culture with opportunities for training, certifications, and knowledge sharing
* Flexible working options with hybrid/remote work opportunities  

  

Sweden benefits include:
* 30 paid holiday days per year
* Healthcare allowance
* Parental salary cover
* Occupational pension and salary exchange options


To find out more about life at Eficode, and hear what our people think about us, click here.

**Location**  

This position is hybrid in Stockholm, combining time at our Stockholm office with remote work.

***DEI Statement***  

*At Eficode we are committed to offering an inclusive recruitment process and equal opportunities for all applicants. We are dedicated to creating a work environment that embraces diversity, inclusion, and respect for all employees. We believe that our differences make us better. We recognise that by having diverse perspectives, skills, ages, genders, backgrounds, and cultures, we will better drive our customers forward and innovate in our field.*

 *To ensure a fair recruitment process, please refrain from sharing unnecessary personal information or an image of yourself in your job application.* ***Salary Development***  

*At Eficode, we believe your compensation should reflect the impact you make and how you grow along the way. Your salary develops through regular check-ins with your team lead, where we look at things like your skills, experience, client work, feedback, and overall contribution — both to your projects and to our culture. As a consultancy, it’s natural that factors like time spent on billable client work are part of the picture — but so are your development, collaboration, and everyday efforts that drive value. We also carry out a company-wide salary review once a year.**On top of your salary, we offer a broad mix of benefits, both financial and non-financial, to support your well-being, work-life balance, and professional growth.*

*Find out more about our benefits [**here**].*

***Beware of recruitment scams****Eficode never asks for payment, bank details, or sensitive personal information during the recruitment process. We only communicate through official Eficode email accounts and approved recruitment platforms. If you receive an unsolicited message, job offer, or request for personal or financial information claiming to be from Eficode, it may be fraudulent.* *#LI-LO1*

title: Build / DevOps Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Build/DevOps Engineer with a passion for optimizing developer workflows and ensuring seamless CI/CD processes.
   

  

**The position:**
 You will be focusing on a high-impact project to reduce friction and improve clarity within our CI/CD pipelines. This role is crucial for our Tech Foundations team, addressing critical capacity needs and ensuring our developers receive fast, reliable, and actionable feedback from our build systems. You will play a pivotal role in boosting developer efficiency and accelerating game development across the studio.
   

  

**Who you are:**
* Proven expertise as a Build/DevOps Engineer, specifically with complex CI/CD systems.
* Previous experience within the gaming industry.
* Strong understanding of CI/CD infrastructure, tooling, and operational pipelines.
* Passionate about improving developer experience and workflow efficiency.
* Skilled in diagnosing complex issues and identifying root causes within CI/CD environments.
* Collaborative and able to work effectively with internal engineering teams and stakeholders.
* Committed to delivering clear documentation and effective knowledge transfer.


**Comfortable working in our tech stack:**
* Jenkins (Groovy, Jenkins pipeline)
* Perforce version control
* Python
* Golang (Used in backend applications)
* Game platform SDKs (Playstation, Xbox, Steam etc)
* Grafana / Zabbix


**What you’ll do:**
* Design and implement improvements to CI/CD system feedback, logging, and error reporting.
* Identify common failure patterns and introduce mechanisms for quick root cause determination.
* Implement targeted enhancements to CI/CD pipelines, tooling, and supporting infrastructure.
* Maintain a healthy CI/CD pipeline, acting on and recovering from pipeline errors to unblock engine development.
* Collaborate closely with Tech Foundations engineers and relevant stakeholders to align changes with existing standards.
* Produce clear documentation and guidance to ensure improvements are adopted and maintainable long-term.


**Other Details:**
 Start: ASAP to 1 month
   

  

 Length: 6 months with possibility to extend
   

  

 Workplace: Stockholm 3 days onsite.

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
So, are you ready to redefine the financial industry? Does a serious technical challenge make your heart beat faster? Do you give energy to those who work with you, and are you looking for an energy-boosting work environment? Then Nordnet is the place for you!
   

  

**About The Role**
 Nordnet is rebuilding the bank on Google Cloud Platform. Not lift-and-shift. Not partial migration. A full architectural transformation.
   

  

 The Cloud Platform team builds and operates the mission-critical foundation that all product teams rely on: robust infrastructure, golden paths, Terraform modules, developer experience, reliability guardrails, and cloud best practices.
   

  

 We’re looking for engineers with strong development backgrounds (Java or Golang preferred) who have transitioned into cloud engineering and want to work at the platform layer, building scalable infrastructure that enables hundreds of engineers to move fast, safely.
   

  

 This role combines software engineering discipline with infrastructure depth. If you enjoy turning complexity into reusable patterns and building platforms that scale people, this job is for you.
   

  

**What Will You Do**
 In this role, you’ll collaborate closely with product and platform teams to:
   

  

* Design and evolve Nordnet’s cloud platform on GCP.
* Develop and maintain Terraform modules and opinionated “golden paths.”
* Create secure and scalable patterns for CloudSQL, networking, IAM, Kubernetes, observability, and more.
* Improve the developer experience around infrastructure provisioning.
* Strengthen reliability, automation, and operational maturity.
* Contribute to standards and support teams in adopting them.


 You won’t be working in isolation; much of the work involves discussion, refinement, and shared ownership.
   

  

**As a Cloud Engineer At Nordnet, You**
* Are an experienced engineer (typically 5+ years in software development).
* Have built production systems in Java or Golang.
* Have experience working with cloud infrastructure in one of the major providers (GCP, AWS, or Azure).
* Understand distributed systems and how they behave under failure.
* Care about automation, CI/CD, and infrastructure as code.
* Communicate clearly and enjoy working with others to find pragmatic solutions.


*You don’t need to tick every box. If you have a passion for building cloud platforms, we encourage you to apply!*
**Experience That Will Help You Succeed**
* Terraform or similar infrastructure-as-code tools.
* Kubernetes in production.
* IAM and cloud security design.
* Networking in cloud environments.
* Observability (metrics, logging, alerting).
* CI/CD pipelines.
* Designing highly available systems.


**What We Offer**
* A collaborative environment where learning is continuous.
* Meaningful technical challenges to tackle together with experienced colleagues.
* Opportunities to grow as an engineer and/or leader.
* Competitive salary and compensation.


 As a Nordnetter, you are a pragmatic collaborator who thrives on open feedback and values simple, maintainable solutions. You enjoy working closely with internal customers and always prioritize systemic thinking over isolated tasks to ensure a holistic impact.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Nordnet was founded to redefine the financial world by giving power back to the customers. Our journey has just begun, and our vision is simple: to make our customers the best investors they can be.
   

  

 With 900 colleagues across the Nordics, we value open communication, creativity, and a flat organization where every effort counts. Our culture is built on passion, simplicity, and transparency. Here, anyone can talk to anyone, and we take pride in a warm atmosphere where great technology is pivotal to our success.
   

  

**Visit us:** 
 nordnetab.com | nordnet.se | nordnet.no | nordnet.dk | nordnet.fi
   

  

**Applications & Questions**
 If you have any questions, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Linnea Liljedahl at Linnea.liljedahl@nordnet.se.
   

  

 Please note that Nordnet conducts credit and background checks on the final candidate as part of our recruitment process.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
