title: AI Solution Architect
description:
På Iver brinner vi för innovation och stark laganda. Vi söker nu dig som vill vara med och realisera kunders idéer med hjälp av AI – och skapa verkligt affärsvärde. Är du vår nya kollega?
   

  

**Iver - We empower our Nordic society**
 Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation. Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort. Med huvudkontor i Stockholm verkar Iver främst i Norden med en agenda att fortsätta expandera. Iver omsätter drygt 3 miljarder SEK och har cirka 1 500 anställda som arbetar på ett av våra 25 kontor i Norden.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 I rollen fokuserar vi på att göra AI konkret, affärsnära och användbar i praktiken. Arbetet innebär att testa och använda AI-lösningar internt för att sedan omsätta erfarenheterna i säkra, skalbara och mätbara lösningar för kunder- från enterprise-plattformar till EU-suveräna open-source-stackar. Målet är att snabbt skapa verkligt affärsvärde genom AI.
   

  

 Som AI Solution Architect är du länken mellan kundens affärsmål och tekniska AI-lösningar. Du har djup teknisk förståelse för AI-arkitektur, integrationer och molninfrastruktur, och kan kommunicera komplexa koncept på ett enkelt sätt till både tekniska och affärsinriktade intressenter. Du har en byggarmentalitet och gillar att skapa skalbara, återanvändbara ramverk och proof-of-concepts. Du samarbetar tätt med sälj, produkt och engineering, och är en teknisk röst i nyckelaffärer. Vi värdesätter stort ägarskap, hög leveranstakt, låg prestige och en vilja att göra verklig skillnad.
   

  

 Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden
   

  

* Designa AI-lösningar med fokus på Microsoft Copilot, Azure AI, OpenAI och open-source-plattformar
* Realisera kunders idéer och affärsbehov med hjälp av AI, LLM, RAG och agentbaserade lösningar
* Leda workshops, förstudier och tekniska diskussioner med kunder och interna team
* Skapa och implementera lösningar som integrerar data, analys och AI för att maximera affärsvärde
* Säkerställa att lösningar uppfyller krav på säkerhet, skalbarhet, kostnadseffektivitet och regelefterlevnad
* Driva och stödja modernisering och migrering av befintliga plattformar till AI-drivna och molnbaserade miljöer
* Vara mentor och tekniskt stöd för konsulter och leveransteam
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om den senaste AI-utvecklingen och bidra till Ivers erbjudanden och tjänsteutveckling


**Vad vi erbjuder:**
 På Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. Vi är inkluderande och strävar efter ett genuint samarbete mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi finns här för att inspirera dig till att nå dina yrkesmässiga mål. Vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden. Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser för att vi ska utvecklas. Vi på Iver ger samma löfte till våra kollegor som till våra kunder. Löftet är att alltid vara ”beside you”, ”behind you” och ”before you”. Vi kallar det för "The Iver way".
   

  

**Förmåner hos oss:**
 📄 Kollektivavtal & trygga villkor
   

  

 🏠 Hybridarbete
   

  

 💪 Friskvårdsbidrag
   

  

 👓 Terminalglasögon
   

  

 ⏳ Tidsbank – 24 h extra ledighet/år
   

  

 🩺 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension (ITP) & flexpension
   

  

**Kvalifikationer och erfarenhet:**
 Vi söker dig som kombinerar teknisk spets med stark affärsförståelse. Du är nyfiken, driver dig själv och kunden mot nya lösningar och har ett stort intresse för AI och datautveckling. Du är en god kommunikatör som kan göra komplex AI begriplig, och du förstår vikten av samarbete för att nå mål.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen bör du ha teknisk kompetens inom en eller flera av följande områden
   

  

* Erfarenhet av Azure AI/AI Foundry, Azure OpenAI samt Copilot och Copilot Studio, inklusive integration i befintliga IT-miljöer och affärssystem.
* Praktisk vana av att integrera LLM:er, arbeta med prompt- och rollinstruktioner, enklare finjustering samt optimering av inferens.
* RAG, embeddings och vektordatabaser (t.ex. Pinecone, FAISS, Qdrant, Chroma, Azure AI Search).
* Erfarenhet av design och implementation av single- och multi-agent-lösningar, med ramverk som LangChain, LangGraph eller Semantic Kernel.
* God förståelse för API-design och systemintegration (OpenAPI/GraphQL)
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD, containerbaserade lösningar (Docker/Kubernetes) samt observability som loggning, metrics och tracing för AI-tjänster i produktion.
* Säkerhet, data governance och regelefterlevnad (GDPR/PII), HA/DR
* Förmåga att snabbt ta fram skalbara PoC:er och POV:er, bygga återanvändbara ramverk och arbeta nära Sales, Product och Engineering. Du kan tydligt översätta tekniska lösningar till affärsvärde och ROI.


**Placeringsort:** 
 Iver finns på 25 platser i Norden. För denna roll ser vi att du utgår från vårt kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg eller Malmö.
   

  

**Övrig information:**
 Vi arbetar med kunder inom alla branscher, inklusive säkerhetsklassade verksamheter. Bakgrundskontroll ingår i rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

**Ansök nu!**
 Urval sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Iver strävar efter jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Sista ansökningsdag 2026-02-28. Vid frågor om rollen, kontakta rekryterande chef Mattias Persson (mattias.persson@iver.se) eller TA Partner Thandi Schüler (thandi.schuer@iver.se)
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**We empower our Nordic society** 
 . Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation.
   

  

**Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder – utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.** 
 Vi säkerställer att sjukvården har tillgång till rätt patientdata, att samhällskritiska system aldrig ligger nere och att flygplanen landar säkert. Som en lyhörd och affärsnära helhetspartner möjliggör vi våra kunders innovation – idag och imorgon.

title: Application Maintenance Engineer
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.
   

  

 Your role
   

  

 As an
 **Application Maintenance Engineer** 
 you will be part of a team responsible for maintaining and supporting applications, ensuring stability and performance. The role involves incident resolution, change implementation, automation, and monitoring across technologies such as Java, JavaScript, Perl, Unix shell scripting, and containerised environments.
   

  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*
* Maintain and support applications, ensuring availability and adherence to SLAs.
* Troubleshoot and resolve incidents; perform root cause analysis and implement fixes. Automate routine maintenance tasks using scripts and tools.
* Apply changes and releases safely across Unix/Linux environments.
* Set up monitoring and dashboards for proactive issue detection. Participate in extended hours/on call support rotation when required.


**Your profile**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related field.
* 5+ years of experience in application maintenance or production support.
* Strong skills in Java, Perl, and Unix/Linux scripting. Working knowledge of JavaScript for minor fixes or enhancements.
* Exposure to monitoring tools (e.g., Grafana) and log analysis. Understanding of ITIL processes (Incident, Problem, Change). Familiarity with Docker and container basics.
* Fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.


***As part of our recruitment process, identity verification will be conducted through inspection of your ID card, and background checks may be carried out as required.***
  

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: 🌟 Sales Development Representative (SDR)
description:
📍 Stockholm (HQ) | 🕒 Heltid | 🌍 Global Sales Development
 


**🚀 Var med och skapa en framtid utan talent waste** 

 På Assessio har vi ett djärvt mål: att eliminera talent waste. Vi vill hjälpa människor att lyckas i roller där de verkligen kan blomstra och prestera på topp. Med vår AI-drivna plattform för people data ger vi företag och organisationer forskningsbaserade verktyg för rekrytering och utveckling – smartare, rättvisare och mer skalbart.
 



 Vi är redan 200+ kollegor i 8 länder och växer snabbt. Nu söker vi en
 **Sales Development Representative (SDR)** 
 till vårt team i Stockholm, med ansvar för den svenska marknaden.
 



**💡 Rollen** 




 Som SDR är du den första kontakten med våra framtida kunder. Du är den som väcker intresse, kvalificerar leads och bokar möten som leder till affärer för våra Account Executives.
 



 Du samarbetar nära både marknadsteamet och vårt nordiska säljteam för att bygga en stark pipeline och skapa långsiktiga relationer.
 


**🔑 Dina ansvarsområden** 
* Skapa och kvalificera både inkommande och utgående leads
* Boka möten och demos för Account Executives i Sverige
* Researcha och identifiera prospekt som matchar vår ICP
* Ta kontakt via e-post, telefon och sociala medier
* Hålla CRM uppdaterat och följa upp dina aktiviteter
* Samarbeta med marknadsteamet för att få ut max av kampanjer
* Lära dig våra SaaS-lösningar och förstå kundernas utmaningar



**👋 Vem är du?** 




 Vi tror på potential – det viktiga är din nyfikenhet och driv. Du kan vara tidigt i din karriär, men vi ser gärna att du är:
 


* Bekväm med att ta kontakt via telefon och digitala kanaler
* Nyfiken, strukturerad och taggad på att växa inom tech-försäljning
* Bosatt i Stockholm och talar flytande svenska & engelska
* En stark kommunikatör och teamplayer
* Målmedveten och resultatorienterad



**🎓 Din bakgrund**
 Vi söker dig med starkt driv och en professionell inställning till försäljning.
 



 Du har gärna tidigare erfarenhet som SDR, BDR eller från B2B-försäljning och är van att arbeta mot tydliga mål och KPI:er. Erfarenhet är inte ett absolut krav, men vi ser det som ett stort plus.
 



 Det är meriterande om du har:
 


* Erfarenhet av försäljning, gärna B2B eller SaaS
* Erfarenhet av CRM-verktyg (t.ex. HubSpot)
* Erfarenhet av kall outreach, t.ex. via telefon, e-post eller LinkedIn



 Men viktigast är att du:
 


* Har ett genuint intresse för försäljning och att skapa värde för kunder
* Är nyfiken, orädd och vill lära dig nytt varje dag
* Har energi, engagemang och gillar att arbeta mot tydliga mål
* Trivs med att arbeta i team och samtidigt kan ta eget ansvar
* Vill vara en del av en snabbväxande SaaS-miljö där vi firar framgångar tillsammans







**🌟 Varför Assessio?** 



* En syftesdriven kultur med en tydlig vision
* Moderna verktyg och flexibelt arbetssätt
* Härligt kontor i centrala Stockholm + hybridupplägg (tre dagar på kontor, två dagar hemma)
* Fastlön + bonus
* Möjlighet att påverka och göra skillnad på den nordiska marknaden
* Tydliga utvecklingsmöjligheter och en resa i ett snabbt växande SaaS-bolag



 Vi lever som vi lär – därför går alla kandidater igenom tre korta tester (personlighet, problemlösning och motivation) för att säkerställa en rättvis och potentialbaserad process.
 



 👉 Redo att bli en del av vår resa?
 **Ansök nu – vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!**

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Expertise: 7+ years of professional software engineering experience, with a deep mastery of React, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
* Leadership: Proven experience leading complex projects from concept to deployment and a track record of mentoring other engineers.
* Systems Thinking: A strong ability to design modular systems and an understanding of how frontend architecture impacts the broader ecosystem.
* Collaborative Mindset: Exceptional communication skills with the ability to translate technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders.


**Application deadline:** 
 17-02-2026
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Enterprise Architect
description:
As of 2 September 2025, Vivicta, former Tietoevry Tech Services, now operates as a standalone company under our new brand. We’ve officially launched Vivicta, your trusted Nordic transformation partner, making everyday easier through technology. You can explore more about our brand and what we stand for at https://www.vivicta.com
   

  

 Ready to join us? Click ‘Apply’ and complete our short application form to get started. Prefer another option? Apply via LinkedIn to automatically populate your details using your profile.
   

  

 Vill du ta en ledande roll i att forma framtidens IT-arkitektur för några av Sveriges mest framstående företag? Är du redo att ta ansvar för strategiska beslut och vägleda både kunder och interna team mot innovativa, hållbara lösningar?
   

  

 Vi söker en senior Enterprise arkitekt till vårt arkitektteam inom Data, Cloud och Security (DCS) i Sverige. Hos oss blir du en nyckelperson som inte bara översätter affärsbehov till tekniska strategier, utan också driver arkitekturvisioner och säkerställer att våra lösningar skapar långsiktigt värde.
   

  

**När du blir en del av Vivicta som Senior Enterprise Architect:**
* Kommer du agera strategisk rådgivare för våra kunder och interna team, med fokus på att definiera och implementera Enterprise-arkitektur som stödjer affärsmål och digital transformation.
* Leda arkitekturinitiativ från idé till genomförande, inklusive styrning av roadmap, standarder och riktlinjer.
* Organisera workshops och strategiska möten med ledningsgrupper för att identifiera teknologiska möjligheter och risker.
* Utveckla och kommunicera arkitekturprinciper som säkerställer skalbarhet, säkerhet och kostnadseffektivitet.
* Driva integration av avancerad dataanalys och AI som en strategisk komponent i kundernas verksamhet.
* Säkerställa att lösningar följer bästa praxis för styrning, compliance och hållbara IT-investeringar.
* Agera mentor/coach för juniora arkitekter och bidra till kompetensutveckling inom teamet.


*Resor kan förekomma i tjänsten, främst inom Sverige.*
**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Du har djup erfarenhet av komplexa IT-landskap och affärsprocesser inom tillverkningsindustrin eller försvarssektorn, och är van att agera rådgivare på högsta nivå.
* Mycket god dokumenterad erfarenhet av Enterprise-arkitektur, med dokumenterad framgång i att leda komplexa IT-transformationer.
* Djup erfarenhet inom minst ett av följande segment: Finans, Bank & Försäkring Industri & Handel, Offentlig sektor
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram strategiska analyser och rekommendationer samt förankra dessa med ledare och beslutsfattare på olika nivåer inom organisationen.
* Expertis inom dataarkitektur, molnplattformar och integration av AI i verksamhetssystem.
* Stark teknisk kompetens inom affärssystem, samt moderna arkitekturmönster (API-first, mikrotjänster, masterdatahantering).
* Djup kompetens inom moderniserings- och transformationsstrategier samt etablerade ramverk för att stödja komplexa förändringsinitiativ.
* Utmärkt förmåga att skapa tydliga och visuellt tilltalande presentationer som omvandlar komplexa frågeställningar till ett enkelt och begripligt format, anpassat för flera olika intressenter.
* Utmärkta kommunikations- och ledarskapsförmågor, med förmåga att inspirera och driva förändring.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Vi Erbjuder Dig**
 Vi erbjuder professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, en öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Hos oss får du möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en nyckel till din framgång. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vårt sätt att arbeta. Dessutom tror vi på nyfikenhet och konstant lärande som en livsstil – där du utvecklas varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.
   

  

**Blev du inspirerad?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer hålls löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Har du frågor om rollen? Kontakta anställande chef Dilek Konduk på dilek.konduk@vivicta.com.
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*
*Vivicta tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*

title: Senior/Lead AWS Engineer with TypeScript
description:
We are seeking a
 **Senior / Lead AWS engineer Consultant** 
 with strong expertise in
 **Global Edge infrastructure** 
 to support the evolution and scaling of a large, business-critical public web platform. The assignment focuses on designing, securing, and standardizing edge-based infrastructure to ensure high performance, scalability, and robust cyber security on a global scale.
 



 The consultant will play a key role in shaping and improving the organization’s public infrastructure, which serves
 **millions of users worldwide** 
 and operates under high availability and security requirements.
 



  





**Start: Preferably asap** 




**Duration: 6 months, with high probability of extension** 




**Location: Stockholm, min 3 days/week onsite required** 




  





**About the assignment:** 



* Design, evolve, and standardize Global Edge infrastructure
* Strengthen security posture using WAF and edge-based protection mechanisms
* Implement and maintain infrastructure using AWS CDK in TypeScript
* Support scalability and performance improvements for a global user base
* Act as a senior technical advisor within the public infrastructure domain



  





**Your profile** 



* AWS CloudFront – design, configuration, optimization, and operation
* AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF) – security rules, protection strategies, and monitoring
* AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) – infrastructure as code, preferably in TypeScript
* TypeScript – used both for infrastructure and supporting services
* Proven experience working with large-scale, high-traffic commercial websites or platforms
* Strong understanding of edge-based architectures and their role in performance, scalability, and security
* Experience operating in environments where availability, latency, and cyber security are critical
* Ability to contribute at both architectural and hands-on implementation level
* Comfortable working in cross-functional teams with platform, security, and development stakeholders

title: Enterprise Architect
description:
As of 2 September 2025, Vivicta, former Tietoevry Tech Services, now operates as a standalone company under our new brand. We’ve officially launched Vivicta, your trusted Nordic transformation partner, making everyday easier through technology. You can explore more about our brand and what we stand for at https://www.vivicta.com
   

  

 Ready to join us? Click ‘Apply’ and complete our short application form to get started. Prefer another option? Apply via LinkedIn to automatically populate your details using your profile.
   

  

 Vill du ta chansen att arbeta med ledande kunder inom olika branscher i IT-sektorn? Vill du också ha en flexibel roll där vi kontinuerligt lär av varandra och erbjuder stora utvecklingsmöjligheter?
   

  

 Vi söker en dynamisk Enterprise arkitekt till vårt arkitektteam inom enheten Data, Cloud and Security (DCS) i Sverige. Du får en nyckelroll och fungerar som bryggan mellan affärsbehov och tekniska lösningar, vilket möjliggör för våra kunder att stärka sina affärsstrategier genom effektiv användning av data.
   

  

**När du börjar på Vivicta som Enterprise arkitekt kommer dina arbetsuppgifter att inkludera:**
* Engagera dig med kundens affärs- och IT-intressenter för att förstå deras affärsstrategi, mål, processer och nuvarande IT-landskap.
* Designa och implementera företagsarkitekturer som anpassar IT-infrastruktur, applikationer och affärsstrategier för att öka effektiviteten och främja kundens affärstillväxt.
* Ge råd om optimering och integration av IT-system för att förbättra kundens dataanvändning för bättre beslutsfattande och innovativa tjänster.
* Leda workshops och möten med kunder för att identifiera möjligheter till teknologiska förbättringar och processutveckling.
* Utveckla omfattande strategier som utnyttjar dataanalys för att föreslå nya affärsmodeller eller tjänster.
* Samarbeta med affärs- och IT-avdelningar för att säkerställa att tekniska lösningar uppfyller strategiska och operativa behov samt följer budget- och tidsramar.
* Överse implementeringen av skalbara och kostnadseffektiva tekniska system som stödjer företagets långsiktiga mål.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste trenderna och teknologierna inom tillverkning för att ge välgrundade råd om hållbara IT-investeringar.


 Resor kan förekomma i tjänsten, främst inom Sverige.
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* God dokumenterad erfarenhet av företagsarkitektur, gärna inom tillverknings-eller försvarsindustrin, med framgång i IT-projekt.
* Flerårig erfarenhet inom minst ett av följande segment:


 Finans, Bank & Försäkring, Industri & Kommersiell verksamhet eller offentlig sektor.
   

  

* God förståelse för affärsprocesser inom drift och kundinteraktioner och förmåga att översätta dessa till effektiva arkitekturlösningar.
* Expertis inom dataarkitektur och plattformar, med erfarenhet av att designa och implementera skalbara, styrda lösningar som integrerar operativ-, kund- och produktdata från kärnsystem för att möjliggöra avancerad analys, AI-adoption och snabbare, bättre beslut.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att integrera AI som en strategisk möjliggörare inom företagsarkitektur för att förbättra effektivitet, stödja prediktivt underhåll och skapa datadrivna tjänster med mätbar ROI och stark styrning.
* God teknisk och arkitektonisk insikt kring affärssystem som SAP eller Microsoft Dynamics eller linkande, kompletterat med erfarenhet av moderna API-first mikrotjänster, produktinformationshantering och masterdatahantering.
* Flytande språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska samt är mycket kommunikativ.


**Vi Erbjuder Dig**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Vi erbjuder dig en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del för att du ska bli framgångsrik. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och konstant lärande som en livsstil där du behöver skola om dig varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.
   

  

**Blev du inspirerad?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta anställande chef, Dilek Konduk, dilek.konduk@vivicta.com.
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*
*Vivicta tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*

title: Security Manager
description:
**Epassi’s purpose is to boost everyday well-being** 
 .
   

  

 We are a leading provider of employee benefit solutions in Europe. We were established in Finland in 2007, and in 2008 we were the first company to launch a mobile-payable employee benefit payment solution in Europe. Since then, we have consistently grown, diversifying our products and introducing our services into new markets. Epassi has been awarded by the Financial Times as one of the fastest-growing companies in Europe on multiple occasions.
   

  

 Are you interested in joining Europe's fastest growing companies? Do you want to impact the wellbeing of millions of employees?
   

  

 If yes, then keep reading and join us to make an impact in a fast-paced and dynamic environment where you’ll play a key role in enabling secure growth across Europe.
   

  

 Epassi’s purpose is to boost everyday well-being. We are a leading provider of employee benefit solutions across Europe. Since our founding in 2007, we have expanded into multiple markets and continue to scale. As we grow, security plays a central role in ensuring business continuity, customer trust, and regulatory compliance.
   

  

 We are currently hiring a
 **Security Manager** 
 to be based in Finland, Sweden, or Germany.
   

  

**Your mission at Epassi**
 As our Security Manager, you will lead our security function and coordinate security operations across multiple European markets.
   

  

 You will take responsibility for managing and developing our security team while ensuring that security governance, certification processes, and regulatory requirements are handled effectively in a fast-growing SaaS environment.
   

  

 You will operate in an environment where goals and expectations are clear, but achieving them requires initiative, prioritization, and independent decision-making. Security at Epassi is not isolated from the business. It is a key enabler of sustainable growth.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Be**
* Manage and support the Security Team, fostering a high‑performance, collaborative environment.
* Lead security operations and ensure alignment with business goals and regulatory requirements.
* Maintain the security governance and audit readiness across multiple markets (e.g., ISO 27001, DORA, and other relevant frameworks).
* Drive certification processes and ensure documentation and evidence are maintained across a broad set of security controls.
* Manage the risk assessments, define mitigation plans, and track improvements to the company’s security posture.
* Oversee the implementation and continuous improvement of security tools and technologies (e.g., SIEM, endpoint protection, IAM, vulnerability scanning).
* Collaborate closely with engineering, product, IT, legal, compliance, and HR teams to embed security into daily processes.
* Promote security awareness and act as a trusted advisor across the organization.


**You’ll Be Successful In This Role If You**
* Deliver certification and audit cycles successfully and on schedule
* Bring clarity and prioritization to a fast-moving security environment
* Ensure agreed initiatives are executed and follow through on commitments
* Raise risks early and propose practical solutions when challenges arise
* Lead experienced specialists through dialogue, trust, and accountability
* Balance security rigor with pragmatic business enablement


 You are comfortable operating in a growth-stage company where priorities evolve and not every process is fully predefined.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing (daily)**
* Guiding and supporting your security team in their operational responsibilities
* Reviewing vulnerabilities, audit findings, and remediation plans
* Coordinating evidence collection and documentation for certification and audit processes
* Participating in design discussions and ensuring secure-by-design principles are applied
* Aligning with engineering and product teams on risk mitigation and prioritization
* Monitoring risks, identifying bottlenecks, and ensuring progress against agreed timelines
* Communicating risks, progress, and priorities clearly to leadership


 You will lead experts who are capable and independent. Your role is to create focus, ensure accountability, and maintain forward momentum.
   

  

**What You Should Bring**
* Several years of experience in information security, with at least 2–3 years in a leadership, managerial, or senior technical role.
* Strong understanding of cloud security, secure software development environments, and modern SaaS risks.
* Hands‑on experience with ISO 27001, SOC 2, PCI DSS, and regulated environments.
* Experience working in a tech, SaaS, or fast-paced growth organization
* A structured, solution-oriented mindset with strong prioritization skills


 Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or similar are considered a plus.
   

  

**Your Language Profile**
 We expect you to have fluent English skills. Other European languages are considered an advantage.
   

  

**Your Track Record**
* Successfully led or contributed to certification or audit programs
* Demonstrated impact in improving organizational security posture
* Experience managing security risks in a technology-driven environment
* Proven ability to deliver initiatives end-to-end and ensure follow-through
* Experience leading or mentoring experienced specialists


**Your Competency Profile**
* Leadership You create clarity, enable autonomy, and build trust within an expert team.
* Accountability & Ownership You take responsibility for outcomes and ensure agreed actions are delivered as planned.
* Proactivity You identify risks early and take initiative to address them before they escalate.
* Communication You translate complex security topics into clear, actionable guidance.
* Analytical mindset You prioritize based on impact and risk, even when multiple demands compete for attention.
* Resilience You remain composed under pressure, especially during audits or tight deadlines.


**Why You Should Join Us**
 Be part of an ambitious growth journey and join a global community of driven, bold, entrepreneurial, yet humble Epassians in a company that is constantly evolving.
   

  

 Work with a clear purpose — boosting everyday wellbeing — and contribute to building a secure foundation for millions of users across Europe.
   

  

 Thrive in an open culture with low hierarchy, where ownership, trust, and collaboration are central to how we work.
   

  

 Join a fast-growing tech company with a strong financial foundation, offering opportunities to grow together with us.
   

  

 The hiring manager for this position is
 **Pekka Pietikäinen, Head of Group IT & Security** 
 at Epassi. For more information, contact the Talent Acquisition team at careers@epassi.com.

title: Sales Executive - Enterprise Informatics
description:
Job Title
   

  

 Sales Executive - Enterprise Informatics
   

  

**Job Description**
 As a
 **Enterprise Sales Executive – Healthcare Informatics** 
 , you will be responsible for focused customer sales and account management, optimizing and positioning the various solutions within the Enterprise Informatics portfolio. You will play a crucial role in increasing sales volume and developing strong relationships with customers to establish Philips as their preferred supplier.
   

  

**Your Role**
* Drive sales within the Enterprise Informatics portfolio and manage accounts, ensuring optimal product mix and sales volume.
* Develop and maintain robust customer relationships, positioning Philips as a preferred supplier.
* Execute sales strategies to exceed quotas, coordinating projects and initiatives to boost team and individual performance.
* Monitor customer activities to ensure visibility and prioritization of sales opportunities.
* Resolve issues creatively while fostering a compliant and impactful culture.
* Network with senior professionals to remain informed about industry trends and leverage this knowledge for business success.


**You're The Right Fit If You**
* Hold a bachelor’s or master’s degree, bringing a strong academic foundation to your role.
* Have a minimum of 5 years of experience in sales or account management in the field of healthcare, showcasing your ability to drive results and manage relationships effectively.
* Possess experience in the healthcare or med tech industries and have established networks within the Swedish healthcare sector.
* Fluent written and verbal in English and Swedish language – is a must-have
* Driving licence (Swedish B) and willingness to travel.


**How We Work Together**
 We believe that we are better together than apart. For our office-based teams, this means working in-person at least 3 days per week.
   

  

 Onsite roles require full-time presence in the company’s facilities.
   

  

 Field roles are most effectively done outside of the company’s main facilities, generally at the customers’ or suppliers’ locations.
   

  

 This role is an field role.
   

  

**About Philips**
 We are a health technology company. We built our entire company around the belief that every human matters, and we won't stop until everybody everywhere has access to the quality healthcare that we all deserve. Do the work of your life to help the lives of others.
   

  

* Learn more about our business.
* Discover our rich and exciting history.
* Learn more about our purpose.


 If you’re interested in this role and have many, but not all, of the experiences needed, we encourage you to apply. You may still be the right candidate for this or other opportunities at Philips. Learn more about our culture of impact with care here.

title: Account Executive, Inside Sales - SMB
description:
The Dell Technologies portfolio of emerging technologies is enough to get your pulse racing. But our customers are our heartbeat and deserve human interaction that is special and unique to their technological needs. Our Inside Sales team is the driving force behind our high-level customer interaction.
   

  

 Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as an
 **Inside Sales Account Executive** 
 on our
 **Small-Medium-Business (SMB) team, Sweden.**
**What You’ll Achieve**
 As an Inside Sales Account Executive, you will be responsible for driving sales for our ground-breaking products by building positive relationships with customers through digital communication. You will own the brand of Dell Technologies, ensuring every customer interaction is tailored and outstanding.
   

  

**You will:**
* Gain new accounts and seek opportunities in your account territory
* Manage small- to medium-sized accounts
* Stay informed of industry trends to help resolve specific market challenges
* Recommend business solutions supported with data


**Take the first step towards your dream career**
 Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:
   

  

**Essential Requirements**
* Ability to articulate the value proposition of our product/service offerings
* Potential to use multiple sales tools simultaneously to complete sales transactions
* Ability to establish relationships with customers and partners
* Fluency in Swedish


**Desirable Requirements**
* 5+ years relevant experience


**Who We Are**
 We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.
   

  

 Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
   

  

 Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here.
   

  

**Job ID:** 
 R268645Job Function: Inside Sales

title: Partner Manager Nordics
description:
**Partner Manager, Nordics**
**Reports To:** 
 Global Director of Go To Market
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Shape the Future of AI & Data with Us**
 At Datatonic, we are Google Cloud's
 **premier partner in AI** 
 , driving transformation for world-class businesses. We push the boundaries of technology with expertise in
 **machine learning** 
 ,
 **data engineering** 
 , and
 **analytics** 
 on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). By partnering with us, clients future-proof their operations, unlock actionable insights, and stay ahead of the curve in a rapidly evolving world.
   

  

 The Partner Manager, EMEA, will play a pivotal role in expanding our position as Google Cloud’s leading Cloud Data + AI Service Partner. In this role, you will be responsible for identifying strategic opportunities, sourcing partner-sourced opportunities (individually and with sales), and driving co-sell motions with Google and complimentary partners. You will work closely with cross-functional teams at Datatonic and across Google to drive partner success and achieve pipeline and sales goals.
   

  

 This is an exciting opportunity to join a fast-growing, leading Cloud Data + AI consultancy, with an unbeatable reputation in the Google Cloud partner ecosystem (10 Partner of the Year awards). With your relationship building skills, commercial acumen and hands-on approach, you’ll evolve our partnership status and will drive tangible impact for the business.
   

  

* Relationship Management:
* Google Cloud: This is the core focus. Building and nurturing relationships at all levels (PDMs, co-sell leads, senior stakeholders in our core strategic verticals) across regions. This involves regular connects, presenting Datatonic's capabilities, and ensuring alignment on goals.
* Other Partners: Developing relationships with complementary partners beyond Google Cloud (aligned to Datatonic business and strategic objectives) to generate pipeline and explore collaborative opportunities, aligned to our strategic verticals and top account focus.
* Strategic Planning & Execution:
* Joint Business Plans (JBPs): Leading the development and execution of JBPs with Google Cloud, aligning on targets, and ensuring buy-in from both sides.
* Go-to-Market (GTM) Plans: Collaborating with internal teams to develop and execute GTM strategies for Datatonic's solutions with Google Cloud.
* Solution Development: Providing Google Cloud's perspective on Datatonic solutions, gathering feedback, and facilitating improvements.
* Business Development & Growth:
* Pipeline Generation: Working with Google Cloud and other partners to identify and drive new business opportunities. This includes identifying key Googlers, leveraging customer success stories, and exploring funding opportunities.
* Workload Management: Collaborating with the Partner Engineer and sales team to track and manage workloads, ensuring smooth delivery and customer satisfaction.
* Communication & Ops Enablement:
* QBRs & Exec alignment: Leading quarterly business reviews and exec alignment trackers with Google Cloud, preparing presentations, and tracking action items.
* Internal & External Communication: Facilitating communication and knowledge sharing between Datatonic and Google Cloud teams. This includes presenting updates, coordinating events, and leading enablement initiatives.
* Partner Ops & Onboarding: Managing Google Cloud partner scorecard, keeping partner operations (eg sourced pipeline, funding requests) up to date, onboarding new team members.


**Targets**
 The role is measured on partner-sourced pipeline and Googler attach expansion, in focus regions (UKI, Nordics).
   

  

**What’s in It for You?**
 We believe in empowering our team to thrive, with benefits including:
   

  

* Holiday: 25 days plus bank holidays (obviously!)
* Health Perks: Private health insurance (Vitality Health) and Smart Health Services
* Fitness & Wellbeing: 50% gym membership discounts (Nuffield Health, Virgin Active, Pure Gym).
* Hybrid Model: A WFH allowance to keep you comfortable.
* Learning & Growth: Access to platforms like Udemy to fuel your curiosity.


**Why Datatonic?**
 Join us to work alongside
 **AI enthusiasts** 
 and
 **data experts** 
 who are shaping tomorrow. At Datatonic, innovation isn’t just encouraged—it’s embedded in everything we do. If you’re ready to inspire change and deliver value at the forefront of data and AI, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Java Architect
description:
**Job Title: Java Architect**

**Location Stockholm, Sweden**
**Job Summary**
 We are seeking an experienced
 **Java Architect** 
 to design, develop, and oversee high-quality enterprise applications. The role involves defining architecture standards, guiding development teams, and ensuring scalable, secure, and high-performance Java solutions aligned with business goals.
   

  

**Required Skills & Experience**

title: Senior Business Controller
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 175,000 businesses - including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others - rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
 







 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
 







 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
 







**About the role** 




 As a Senior Business Controller in the OPEX FP&A team, you will act as a strategic finance partner to the CTO of Sinch and senior leaders within the CTO organization. You will support and challenge the business to set and achieve financial targets, drive cost efficiency, and enable data-driven decision making. You will play a key role in reporting, forecasting, budgeting, and long-term financial steering, while proactively identifying opportunities for optimization and improvement.
 







 You will be the primary finance partner to our CTO, collaborating with fellow finance partners in an international OPEX FP&A team across Sweden and the US to deliver best-in-class stakeholder support. Together with other Business Controllers and cross-functional teams across Sinch, you will drive efficient ways of working while continuously improving data quality, processes, and business insights.
 







**Key responsibilities:** 



* Act as the finance partner to our CTO, and a trusted finance partner to senior stakeholders within the Tech organization by enabling data driven decision making.
* Support, discuss and challenge financial performance with budget owners and managers.
* Drive financial steering through reporting, analysis, storytelling, budgeting, forecasting, etc.
* Provide insights and recommendations for strategic decisions, including ROI analysis, business plan reviews, and cost optimization initiatives.
* Contribute to continuous improvement of FP&A processes, tools, and data quality.







 The role is based at SINCH HQ in Stockholm, Sweden and reports to SINCH Manager, OPEX, FP&A.
 







**About you** 




 To be successful in this role you need to be technical, analytical, with a passion for numbers and be able to see and communicate the bigger picture. You are driven, ambitious and take own initiatives, as well as a good communicator who can influence different stakeholder groups, adapting the content & language to the audience. You are hands on, result oriented, and most importantly, you are a senior business partner always looking out for the interest of the business.
 






* Significant experience (7+ years) in Business Control, FP&A, Management Consulting, or similar roles in a large, international organization
* Experience from working with cost allocations and allocation models
* Proven track record of driving process improvement and automation
* MSc or equivalent degree with a strong academic record
* Fluent in English, written and spoken







**Big plus!** 



* Hands-on experience using AI tools to drive efficiency and process improvement
* Experience from Telco, Messaging or OTT industries
* Experience from high-growth or fast-scaling environments
* Fluent in Swedish
* Experience from working with such systems as Aaro, Tableau or similar.
* Experience from Cloud governance & reporting







**Practical information** 



* Our corporate language is English; please submit your application in English
* Relocation support is not provided







 Applicants must:
 


* Hold Swedish or EU/EEA citizenship
* Have a valid Swedish work permit







**Our hiring process** 




 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
 







 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Full-stack PHP Developer
description:
We are currently looking for Full-stack Developers to join our newly formed Flight Planning Team in central Stockholm. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who wants to work in a developer team in a mid-sized company, serving a large and passionate user base worldwide.
 



  





**About Navigraph** 




  





 Navigraph is a SaaS company providing aviation fans and aspiring pilots with charts, navigation data, flight planning tools, and training material. Our 1.7 million users fly everything from Microsoft Flight Simulator to X-Plane. With our Electronic Flight Bag, virtual avionics, flight planning tools, performance calculators, and teaching material we’re the trusted co-pilot for any serious virtual aviator.
 



  





 We have a diverse tech stack consisting of PHP, TS and some Rust and C#, where most apps are based on React and React Native - all with a strong focus on usability and modern design. Our mission? To make flight simulation as realistic and immersive as possible by making data, software, and tools like those available to the aviation industry accessible for flight simulation gaming.
 



  





 We're a team of 50+, including software developers, UX and graphic designers, data analysts, content producers, motion designers, and support specialists. Navigraph was founded by Stephen O'Connell (CTO) and Magnus Axholt (CEO), both of whom are still active in the company. We've grown considerably but kept the collaborative, creative culture we started with.
 



  





 Check out our career site for more information on who we are ✨. 
 



  





**What makes us different** 




  





 Navigraph is privately held, profitable, and built on the principle that people come first. That means prioritizing product quality and employee satisfaction. 
 



  





 The problem space is unusual: professional aviation complexity, consumer-grade usability expectations, and platforms spanning mobile, web, desktop, and in-simulator environments, including VR. You won't find this combination elsewhere.
 



  





**The Role and the Team** 




  





 You will join the Flight Planning Team and play a key role in the development of SimBrief, the number one flight planning tool used by flight simmers, bringing new features to enthusiastic users all around the world. Its advanced planning and performance features closely mimics those used by real pilots and airlines.
 



 SimBrief is built on the LAMP stack and besides writing code you are expected to work, maintain and improve the rest of the stack. Hence a requirement is to be comfortable not only in PHP but with handling configuration of the webservers, databases etc in a GNU/Linux environment. An example here is working with the team to move the service to the same cloud setup that the rest of Navigraph is using.
 



  





 The team will be split up between Canada and Sweden, with you and another colleague working from the Stockholm office.
 



  





**What We’re Looking For!** 




  





**Professional experience** 



* Deep and proven experience in building and maintaining robust software
* Proficiency in PHP, and relational databases
* Experience in TypeScript and Node.js
* Passionate about both frontend and backend development
* Proficiency with GNU/Linux, shell scripts, Apache and NGINX
* Proficiency with HTML/CSS/JS
* Collaborate well with people in teams, both on-site and remote and used to pair programming.
* Understand the value of delivering and working together as a team.
* Ability to break down bigger tasks into smaller items that you ship continuously
* Fluent in written and spoken English



  





**Nice to have** 



* Experience with flight planning and aircraft performance calculations
* Experience with DevOps and managing cloud infrastructure - preferably AWS
* Experience with React and React Native
* Understanding of principles in aeronautical navigation
* Passion for flight simulation and aviation



  





**What We Offer!** 




  





 Navigraph is built on an open, caring culture where people genuinely come first. The structure is flat, leadership is hands-on, and flexibility is based on trust. Innovation and creativity aren't just tolerated, they're expected. You'll join a team that genuinely enjoys what they do and takes pride in setting the standard for what flight simulation tools can be. Apart from this we're also offering;
 



  




* Flexible Work Options: On-site and hybrid.
* A great benefits package: please check out our career site.
* Growth Opportunities: We’ll support your professional development and give you the resources to excel.
* Memorable experiences: The Navigraph team is a tight-knit group with diverse backgrounds and experiences. We enjoy spending time together and our annual work trips are always combined with team-building activities that leave lasting impressions!



  





  





**How to Join the Team?** 




  





 We’re reviewing applications quickly - so don’t leave us hanging too long! 🚀✈️ Apply now and help us take Navigraph - and flight simulation - to the next level!

title: Enterprise Architect sökes till fastighetsbolag – Stockholm/Göteborg
description:
*Vill du ha en nyckelroll i att forma och utveckla ett modernt, hållbart och framtidssäkrat IT-landskap? Vi söker en teknisk Enterprise Architect som vill arbeta både strategiskt och operativt med att översätta verksamhetens behov till en sammanhållen målarkitektur. Läs gärna vidare!* 




  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Perido söker en Enterprise Architect till vår kund, ett stort fastighetsbolag. Tjänsten är placerad på kundens kontor i antingen Stockholm eller Göteborg. Du utgår från kontoret men ges viss möjlighet till distansarbete.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som Enterprise Architect ansvarar du för organisationens övergripande system- och applikationsarkitektur. Du har ett helhetsperspektiv där verksamhetskrav, strategiska mål och tekniska möjligheter vävs samman till ett framtida målarkitekturlandskap. Rollen kombinerar strategiskt arkitekturarbete med djup teknisk förståelse inom integrationer, infrastruktur och tekniska standarder. Du arbetar nära verksamheten, IT-ledning, produktägare, utvecklingsteam och externa leverantörer och fungerar som ett tekniskt beslutsstöd i större initiativ.
 



 I rollen kommer du bland annat att:
 


* Äga, utveckla och förvalta den övergripande målarkitekturen för system- och applikationslandskapet
* Mappa verksamhetskrav och strategiska mål till arkitekturprinciper, förmågor och konkreta tekniska lösningar
* Definiera arkitekturprinciper, riktlinjer och standarder för applikationer, integrationer och infrastruktur
* Säkerställa att nya och befintliga lösningar är i linje med målarkitekturen och bidrar till långsiktig hållbarhet
* Utforma och specificera integrationsarkitektur, inklusive integrationsmönster, API-strategi och informationsflöden
* Specificera tekniska krav på infrastruktur, plattformar och molnarkitektur, exempelvis avseende nätverk, säkerhet, tillgänglighet och skalbarhet
* Agera teknisk rådgivare och beslutsstöd i större projekt, initiativ och upphandlingar
* Samverka med lösningsarkitekter, utvecklingsteam och leverantörer för att säkerställa korrekt implementering av arkitekturella beslut
* Följa upp arkitekturefterlevnad och bidra till kontinuerlig förbättring av arkitekturarbetet



  





**Dina egenskaper** 




 Du är en kommunikativ och analytisk person som är trygg i komplexa tekniska miljöer och har förmåga att se helheten utan att tappa viktiga detaljer. Du arbetar strukturerat och beslutsamt med god balans mellan långsiktigt arkitekturarbete och pragmatiska lösningar. Som person är du samarbetsinriktad, förtroendeskapande och van att arbeta tvärfunktionellt med både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter.
 



 Du är varmt välkommen att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 




  





**Kvalifikationer:** 



* Flerårig erfarenhet som enterprise architect, teknisk arkitekt eller motsvarande roll i större IT-miljöer
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att ta fram och förvalta målarkitekturer för system- och applikationslandskap
* Mycket god kunskap inom integrationsarkitektur, exempelvis API:er, eventdriven arkitektur, microservices och integrationsplattformar
* Erfarenhet av att designa och specificera moln- och hybridinfrastruktur, exempelvis inom Azure
* Vana att arbeta med kravhantering och att översätta affärsbehov till tekniska och arkitekturella krav
* God förståelse för datamodellering, informationsarkitektur och dataflöden mellan system



  





**Meriterande:** 



* Erfarenhet av större transformationsinitiativ, exempelvis molnresor eller modernisering av legacy-system
* Erfarenhet från fastighetsbranschen



  





**Omfattning och tillträde** 




 Heltid, konsultuppdrag i 12 månader. Start omgående.
 



  





**Vi hjälper dig till nästa steg i yrkeslivet** 




 Vår vision är att alla ska trivas och vara engagerade på jobbet. Hos oss finns en stor variation av uppdrag, där du kan bli anställd direkt hos ett företag eller arbeta som konsult via Perido. Vi är ett av Sveriges största konsultföretag för tjänstemän, vilket ger dig många möjligheter. Som konsult blir du en viktig del av vår organisation och bidrar med din kompetens ute hos våra kunder. Läs mer om oss på Perido:
 
 https://perido.se/om-oss/
 




 De flesta frågor eller funderingar kan du hitta svar på under
 
 perido.se/vanliga-fragor/
 
 . Om du fortfarande inte hittat svaret du söker är du välkommen att kontakta oss på
 **fraga@perido.se** 
 . Ange alltid tjänstens referensnummer
 **35671** 
 i ämnesraden. Vänligen notera att vi endast tar emot ansökningar på vår hemsida och att vi inte har möjlighet att svara på hur du ligger till i processen eller vilket kundföretaget är om det utelämnats ur annonsen.

title: Wireless Protocol Engineer
description:
**Overview**
 Keysight is at the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our ~15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.
   

  

 Our award-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.
   

  

 Keysight is looking for a RAN-focused wireless software engineer with deep 3GPP expertise to help build and evolve test, emulation, and validation solutions used across the wireless ecosystem—spanning device, chipset, network infrastructure, and Open RAN. You’ll work close to standards and real implementations, translating specifications into robust software capabilities that enable customers to validate conformance, interoperability, and performance across the RAN lifecycle.
   

  

 This role is ideal for someone coming from a leading RAN organization who enjoys working at the intersection of
 **3GPP specs** 
 ,
 **real network behavior** 
 , and
 **high-quality software** 
 .
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design and implement software capabilities aligned to 3GPP LTE/NR (e.g., RRC, PDCP/RLC/MAC, PHY interactions, procedures, state machines, timers, KPI/measurement semantics).
* Convert evolving requirements (3GPP releases, operator acceptance needs, O-RAN priorities) into clear software designs, test workflows, and reusable components.
* Build and maintain automation and tooling for protocol conformance, interoperability, and performance validation for RAN-facing scenarios.
* Collaborate with cross-functional experts (systems, RF, protocol, product, customers/partners) to reproduce field issues, debug complex behaviors, and deliver fixes with strong root-cause discipline.
* Create high-signal artifacts: design docs, test plans, trace/pcap interpretations, and technical notes that stand up to scrutiny from senior telecom engineers.
* Contribute to solution evolution for modern RAN architectures including Open RAN / O-RAN interfaces and multi-vendor environments.


**What You’ll Work With**
* Open RAN / RAN & Core validation: automated suites enabling conformance, interoperability, performance, security, and energy-efficiency validation across the test lifecycle.
* 5G network emulation: solutions covering NR, sub-6 and mmWave use cases and test domains; software paired with network emulation platforms to emulate 5G NR network behavior and configure standards-compliant testing.
* RAN measurement & optimization tooling (as applicable): field test/verification support for advanced 5G NR technologies like DSS, beamforming, massive MIMO, and O-RAN.


**Qualifications**
* Strong, hands-on expertise in 3GPP LTE/NR with a clear RAN focus (e.g., L1/L2/L3 procedures, scheduling concepts, mobility, bearers, signaling flows, performance metrics).
* Professional software engineering experience (typically 8+ years, but we value depth and scope over a number).
* Strong coding skills in C/C++ (and/or modern Python for automation/tooling); comfortable in Linux development environments.
* Proven ability to debug distributed/real-time systems: logs, traces, protocol analyzers, KPIs, timing, performance bottlenecks.
* Clear technical communication in English (written and verbal), including turning complex spec-driven topics into implementable requirements.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with RAN product development (gNB/eNB), RAN performance optimization, or feature verification in complex system environments.
* Familiarity with O-RAN architecture/interfaces (O-RU/O-DU/O-CU, fronthaul, RIC concepts) and multi-vendor integration challenges.
* Experience with CI/CD, test frameworks, containers, and/or cloud-based deployment environments.
* Prior exposure to standards work (3GPP RAN1/2/4/5) or strong experience implementing features directly from evolving specs.

title: Senior Customs Expert
description:
**Title:** **Senior Customs Expert**
====================================

Location:
Lund, SE  

*At Tetra Pak we commit to making food safe and available, everywhere; and we protect what's good – protecting food, protecting people, and protecting the planet. By doing so we touch millions of people's lives every day.*


*And we need people like you to make it happen.*


***We empower you to reach your potential with opportunities to make an impact to be proud of – for food, people and the planet.***

**Job Summary**
---------------



We are creating a new organization with the aim to put a well-defined and standardized global Customs & Import operating model in place across all relevant dimensions, from compliance, customer service, operational efficiency to leveraging free-trade agreements and customs costs.

  

We are now looking for a professional Senior Customs Expert, who will perform execution of continuous improvement for all processes associated with import /export and ensure end-to-end daily activities defined into Customs RACI and compliance with country rules and regulations. You will work directly with regional and local teams with operational/tactical customs activities (import and export flow) and provide stakeholders with customs and trade solutions.

  

The location for this position is Lund, Sweden and this is a permanent position. Very limited travels, less than 30 days.

**What you will do**
--------------------



As Senior Customs Expert, you will:


* Drive operational performance of import, export and transit activities
* Point of contact for local customs authorities to ensure compliance
* Answer queries and providing support to stakeholders engaged in cross-border activities.
* Drive Operational interactions with brokers/3rd parties
* Identify potential optimization regarding operating costs and opportunities for reducing customs duty spend
* Ensure end-to-end daily activities defined into Customs roles & responsibilities matrix and compliance with country rules and regulations
* Ensure the compliance under the Authorized Economic Operator authorization, Inward processing and Outward processing regimes.
* Execution of continuous improvement for all processes
* Continuously monitor relevant Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) with partners
* Streamline customs operations processes where possible
* Proactively avoid or mitigate any potential business continuity or economic risk related to Tetra Pak operational structure and its customs transactions.
* Ensure the correct Tariff classification of goods imported and exported.
**We believe you have**
-----------------------


* At least 5 years of experience from working with Customs
* A Bachelors Degree in International Trade, Economics, Administration, International Business or similar fields
* Experience in Customs Software or SAP is a plus
* Domain in the office package, mainly Excel
* Strong stakeholders management skills
* Strong collaboration and conflict management skills
* An innovation mindset and a drive to find solutions and opportunities
* Fluent in English and Swedish is a must


  

We believe that you are a resilient and self-motivated person and an expert in terms of finding and driving improvements. You enjoy working in a dynamic and regional environment with people from various cultures. The challenge of continuously improving and find opportunities for growth through customs trade flows and special regimes is highly motivating to you.**We Offer You**


* A variety of exciting challenges with ample opportunities for development and training in a truly global landscape
* A culture that pioneers a spirit of innovation where our industry experts drive visible results
* An equal opportunity employment experience that values diversity and inclusion
* Market competitive compensation and benefits with flexible working arrangements

  


**Apply Now**



If you are inspired to be part of our promise to protect what’s good; for food, people, and the planet, apply through our careers page at https://jobs.tetrapak.com/.



This job posting expires on **2026-02-25.**



For questions about the position please reach out to hiring manager Marija Sljivic at Marija.Sljivic@tetrapak.com



If you have any questions about your application, please contact Sara Johannesson at sara.johannesson@tetrapak.com



For trade union information contact Sveriges ingenjörer Lars Haraldsson at +46 46 36 2533 and Unionen Lisbeth Larsson at +46 46 36 2320

  


*Diversity, equity, and inclusion is an everyday part of how we work. We give people a place to belong and support to thrive, an environment where everyone can be comfortable being themselves and has equal opportunities to grow and succeed. We embrace difference, celebrate people for who they are, and for the diversity they bring that helps us better understand and connect with our customers and communities worldwide.*
company_description: At Tetra Pak we like a good challenge, and our promise is to make food safe and available everywhere.

title: Motion Control Engineer
description:
Vill du jobba med mjukvara som styr verklig rörelse? Där millisekunder, stabilitet och precision spelar roll? Nu söker vi 2 konsulter till ett tekniskt starkt R&D-team inom avancerad mekatronik och motion control.

### **Uppdraget**


Du utvecklar, optimerar och underhåller mjukvara i motion control-domänen. Nära mekatronik, styrsystem och embedded/realtid.

### **Du kommer bl.a. att**

* Utveckla och optimera motion control-relaterad mjukvara
* Arbeta nära embedded/real-time och mekatroniska system
* Bidra i systemdesign, test, felsökning och prestandaförbättringar
* Samarbeta tvärfunktionellt i R&D (software/mech/elektronik)

### **Krav**

* Stark programmering i C/C++ och/eller MATLAB/Python
* Erfarenhet av embedded systems (RTOS är meriterande)
* Erfarenhet från industriell eller avancerad R&D-miljö är meriterande
* Flytande engelska (svenska är ett plus)

### **Extra plus**

* Reglerteknik/motion control (PID, modellering, tuning, trajectories)
* Test/validering (HIL/SIL), testautomation, diagnostik
* Systemarkitektur och mjukvarudesign  

  

Du blir anställd som konsult hos oss och uthyrd till kundens R&D-team. Vi rekryterar löpande så annonsen kan komma att tas bort innan slutdatum.

title: Engineering Manager
description:
You know that bit where every company says they’re *“changing the world”*? Yeah, it can feel a little forced. But we like to think our story actually has some realness to it.


Our story begins with Shadi Bitar and Ninos Malki, who came to Sweden from Syria as kids and discovered that books could be a bridge – helping them learn the language, understand the culture, and explore new worlds.


A thought emerged, *what if everyone could have that?* And just like that, Nextory was born – your all-access pass to read, listen, and discover new perspectives without limits.


And now, we’re searching for an **Engineering Manager** who’s ready to lead the way. Turning ideas into experiences that inspire people to start their reading journey with us.

**Let us tell you about the role**

As an Engineering Manager at Nextory, you’ll lead our Join Team – the talented group shaping the web experience at the very beginning of the customer journey with us. You’ll play a key role in inspiring potential readers to take their first step into the world of Nextory, combining technical leadership with people development to create seamless, engaging and high-performing digital experiences.


Your work will include:

* Managing and empowering a team of six engineers to grow, collaborate, and deliver impact.
* Ensuring technical excellence and delivery quality in close collaboration with product and design.
* Driving transparency, collaboration, and innovation across teams.

**The main character we’re looking for**

You have a solid background as a software engineer and several years of experience leading developers in a fast-moving digital environment. You take pride in building teams that consistently deliver results, and have fun doing it. We believe you thrive on creating an environment where people grow, perform at their best and turn great ideas into measurable results.


We believe you:

* Bring experience from full-stack environments, with a true passion for frontend development.
* Feel confident working with JavaScript and TypeScript with a Java backend.
* Understand how to build high-performing web applications, CI/CD pipelines and smart SEO practices
* Have a track record of improving customer onboarding journeys and turning insights into great user experiences.

**The Nextory way of working**

At Nextory, we believe a strong and inclusive culture is key to our success – and that culture flourishes when we meet and collaborate in person as much as possible. That’s why we spend the majority of the working time at our beautiful office!


We are based in Stockholm, Sweden, with offices in Paris and Bangalore. Our hybrid work policy includes four days in the office and Wednesdays as a work-from-home day.

**Your next story starts here**


We look forward to your application . Applications are reviewed continuously and if you have any questions about the role, please contact erika.thorslund@nextory.com

*Please note that we do not offer relocation and that a six-month probationary period applies.*

title: Software Release Engineer - Automotive
description:
We are looking for a **Software Release Engineer - Automotive** for a global automotive company in **Gothenburg.**

**Start is ASAP, 2 years limited contract to begin with, Possibility of extension after that.**


We are looking for you with experience from Automotive who has at least a BSc degree in Software Engineering, or similar.


You have strong passion and competence of SW release and configuration management in automotive industry, familiar with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery), SW variants management, SW branches management, and SW release documentation.


You have strong technical background and communication skills that allow you to collaborate with a diverse set of stakeholders, help the organization to improve the process and quality of SW release and configuration management continuously.


**As a Software Release Engineer, you have below responsibilities:**

**Software release activities:**

* SW signing and SW release towards milestones
* Release SW Part Numbers and Documentation for every SW release milestone
* SUMS SW package manifest, Loadfiles manifest, Compliance Report
* Ensure Carcom and SDB diagnostic signal database are aligned
* Facilitating SW release approvals, deviations etc.

**Supplier management:**

* Supplier SW release planning
* Supplier SW backlog management
* Supplier SW delivery follow-up
* QOP / Finance topics follow-up
* Supplier SW Joint Review (SWJR)

**Factory and Aftermarket support:**

* Support Factory and Aftermarket through deviations
* Support SW release in factory

**New project support:**

* Support sourcing process and documentation
* SWRS for BaseTech and Application (SWRS = Software Requirement Specification)

**Competence/Tools needed:**

* Vehicle product development process in automotive industry
* SWAT. PIE R&D.
* Jenkins. ConfigHub. Victoria. Artifactory.
* KDP. TCPLM. Teamcenter. Carweaver.
* Carcom. SDB.
* TPDE. TPDS. DESD.
* QOP/VPC. Pecca Procost. Lotus Notes.
* Vira. Confluence.


This is a full-time consultant position in **Gothenburg** through Incluso. Start is **ASAP, 2 years** limited contract to begin with, with possibility of extension after that.  

  

Please submit your CV as soon as possible since we will review the applications on an on-going basis.


For more information about this role, please contact **Kanika Singhal** recruiter at Incluso.

title: Service Engineer - Instrumentation & Test Systems
description:
**Service Engineer - Instrumentation & Test Systems**
=====================================================

  

Vill du arbeta nära den senaste tekniken, lösa komplexa utmaningar och vara den person som kunder litar på när avancerade testsystem ska fungera på topp? Då kan du vara den Service Engineer vi söker.  

  

Hos AVL List Nordiska arbetar vi i framkant inom Instrumentation & Test Systems på den nordiska marknaden. Vi är ett team på 30 personer i Göteborg och Stockholm – och nu behöver vi en Service Engineer till vårt team i Södertälje. Hos oss får du en roll där du kombinerar teknik, problemlösning och kundkontakt, samtidigt som du får stora möjligheter att utvecklas i en internationell miljö.

  


**DINA ANSVARSOMRÅDEN:**

  


Som Service Engineer hos oss blir du den person som våra kunder litar på när tekniken måste fungera. Du skapar kundnöjdhet genom att leverera hög kvalitet, hålla vad du lovar och vara den som alltid har koll på läget. I vardagen växlar du mellan olika uppdrag, prioriterar smart och tar dig an arbetet självständigt med stor frihet under ansvar.  

  

Du arbetar även tätt tillsammans med ditt team – både internt och ute hos kund. I många uppdrag är samarbetet inom teamet helt avgörande för att arbetet ska lyckas, samtidigt som du förväntas kunna ta ansvar för egna uppgifter när situationen kräver det. Du behöver därför trivas med att växla mellan nära teamarbete och självständigt arbete.  

  

Du går in i varje uppdrag väl förberedd och blir en viktig del i att driva våra förbättringsprocesser framåt, med fokus på både kvalitet och effektivitet. Rollen ger dig möjlighet att verkligen lära känna våra kunders system, utrustning, processer och säkerhetskrav – samtidigt som du får utvecklas tekniskt i en miljö där ny teknologi är en naturlig del av jobbet.  

  

Dessutom kan rollen ge dig chansen att ta dig utanför Sverige då vissa uppdrag sker internationellt – perfekt för dig som gillar variation och vill se mer av världen genom jobbet.

  


**DIN PROFIL:**

  


Du är service-minded, kommunikativ och trivs i en roll där du får kombinera teknik och kundkontakt. För att lyckas hos oss tror vi att du har:


* Mycket god social förmåga och en positiv approach
* Du behärskar svenska och engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt
* Erfarenhet och/eller kunskap inom automation, programmering och PLC
* Erfarenhet av mekanik och/eller el
* En nyfikenhet att lära dig våra system och lösningar – har du jobbat med AVL-produkter tidigare är det ett plus
* B-körkort och en vilja att resa


**Meriterande:**


* Dokumenterad erfarenhet från fordons-industrin, gärna från test- eller utvecklingsmiljöer

  





**VI ERBJUDER:**

  


* En strukturerad utbildningsplan och stöd att växa tekniskt
* Möjlighet att vara del av framtidens mobilitetslösningar tillsammans med våra kunder
* Kollektivavtal, försäkringar och attraktiva förmåner inklusive friskvårdsbidrag
* En kultur som uppmuntrar lärande och långsiktig utveckling

  


**Intresserad?**  

Skicka genast in din online ansökan till AVL!


**About AVL**
-------------


AVL is one of the world’s leading mobility technology companies for development, simulation and testing in the automotive industry, and beyond. We provide concepts, solutions and methodologies in fields like vehicle development and integration, e-mobility, automated and connected mobility (ADAS/AD), and software for a greener, safer, better world of mobility.
